My biggest dislike is the App Store not as many but that not a huge deal. I don't think you will be disappointed if you purchase. It's great for the money!!!!

Reviews.Title: May favorite piece of technology
Reviews.Author: Alexis Riccione
Reviews.Content: I have not one single complaint about my Kindle fire HDX.  I love this and use it all the time.

Reviews.Title: GREAT DEVICE AND WONDERFUL CUSTOMER SERVICE
Reviews.Author: ELAINE ELLIOTT
Reviews.Content: I recently purchased the Kindle Fire HDX and I love love love it.It is simple to use and I don't know how I got on with out it.Having said all that, let me tell you that the MAYDAY people are without a doubt the most helpful and patient tech support folks I have ever encountered.I had a little trouble with my head phone jack.  MY OWN fault , I was not clicking in the jack firmly enough.After, a couple of attempts to help me, they sent me a new device ( arrived 2 days) and I still was the" dummy on board".They didn't give up on me and we solved my problem.I was never made to feel like I was wrong or stupid or anything but a valued customer.If you are not all that tech savvy but would like to have a tablet , don't be afraid of this little device and take comfort in the assistance that is available with it.

Reviews.Title: Took two tries
Reviews.Author: Jack Roberts
Reviews.Content: The first one malfunctioned (screen), but received replacement in a timely manner. This one works great and the wife loves it.

Reviews.Title: I love it
Reviews.Author: brian
Reviews.Content: great iteam I can now read any where I go and on my lunch break. if I take a long bus ride it will be great

Reviews.Title: Affordable
Reviews.Author: Ricki Lynn "rickilynn"
Reviews.Content: I got this on sale around Christmas. For what it is and what it does, I'm happy with the price I paid. It was a gift for my parents and they use it all the time.I do have to say though, it's NOT very user friendly. After using an iPad and iPhone for the past couple of years, learning how to use the Kindle was kind of a challenge for me. And if I'd gotten my parents an iPad instead of this, I'm sure they'd have wayyyy less questions for me. Every time I visit them there's another "thing" they "can't get the Kindle to do" or whatever. I can figure it out, but it's just harder than it should be.

Reviews.Title: kindle fire 7
Reviews.Author: alan l. harman
Reviews.Content: I gave it a 4 because it took a while to get it started. My lack of skill in understanding the directions was the main problem, not the tablet itself. While it  was only a 7 and not the 8.9, I had no problems reading it at all. Yeah, I'd recommend it , and if you need help, the backup is there!

Reviews.Title: Very nice
Reviews.Author: Jon Stall
Reviews.Content: I have one of the original Kindle Fire's when they cam out and I must say this version is allot nicer and way more up to date. Me and my family love using this device and it saves on my electric bill, I use it more than my big desktop and I must say its fast clean and very friendly to use.

Reviews.Title: My Kindle Fire HDX
Reviews.Author: Linda Johnson
Reviews.Content: I originally had the Kindle Fire and I really loved it but I started to see ads for the HDX. I finally purchased it. I love it!!! I have used the Mayday button a few times. It so convenient to have help at my finger tips. I love the screen it is so bright. I take my HDX everywhere with me.

Reviews.Title: Kindle HDX
Reviews.Author: AJI
Reviews.Content: The Kindle HDX arrived very quickly and the person receiving it was very happy and delighted with it.Gratefully,Jean

Reviews.Title: recomend hdx
Reviews.Author: nelson byrum
Reviews.Content: Blue edge is on screen but not a problem. Battery does not hold charge as long as would like but I still recommend this kindle. Use it for reading, on the web & games.

Reviews.Title: Great for reading,
Reviews.Author: BlueIce
Reviews.Content: Love this, first pad type device I have ever owned.  Great for reading and games. Happily I actually found a nice pinochle game app for free that plays double deck!

Reviews.Title: Super great product!!!!
Reviews.Author: gypsygerl
Reviews.Content: It was a golden birthday gift for my daughter.  She is in her glory.  She's always wanted one.  It was also delivered within the time frame that was indicated in the shipping notification.

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: Alexander McLellan
Reviews.Content: looks great works great is great! you should buy one too. make sure to get a case and screen protectors.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: nancy martin
Reviews.Content: Love the kindle fire only wish he had capability of playing some games that I play on my computer. But all and all its great and has lots of free games.

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: bill varconie
Reviews.Content: i am pleased with clarity and simplicity of operating system,  i don't have any more words this is ridiculous-stupid concept

Reviews.Title: grandsons approved
Reviews.Author: pic taking granny
Reviews.Content: got this with the intention of using it myself but it turned out to be a great investment to keep the grandsons occupied

Reviews.Title: Love, Love, Love it!
Reviews.Author: Lynn Johnson "Lynn Johnson"
Reviews.Content: I bought this Kindle for my husband to take with him on the ship. He is in the Navy and needed something light to take with him to listen to music and to Skype with me while he is away. The battery life is ok, I added a few things to it, like Dolphin browser and it actually makes web browsing faster ;)He watches movies on it and can message me from it. I'm so glad I bought it!The price was also great for my budget. :)

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Beverly Belyea
Reviews.Content: The HD display is super.  The calendar is great, it updates the calendar in my phone.  It is easy to use.  I would recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Amazing Product
Reviews.Author: Robert L. Peck
Reviews.Content: The Kindle Fire exceeded my expectations.  it has great screen resolution and is very user friendly.  I'd highly recommend this device.

Reviews.Title: This thing is great!
Reviews.Author: Will S.
Reviews.Content: I've had the Nook Simple touch and all the time was thinking I should have gotten the Kindle. While I like apple products, this kindle has some nice features the others don't... I love the immersion reading option... and it has all the apps I use available in the kindle app store.Pros:sleek and lightmost of the popular appstext to speech (reads to you)immersion experienceCons:Hard to see in sunlight (expected as its not e-ink)Makes buying things from Amazon a bit too easy!Very happy with the purchase...

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: Enjoy because I can read books and also use the web.  So easy to travel with.  No more taking laptop

Reviews.Title: HAPPY HAPPY HAPPY
Reviews.Author: Edna C. Brooks "sassy reader"
Reviews.Content: Im very happy with my Kindle Fire HDX.  It's easy to operate and there are so many apps out there I can download.  With the 2 yr Protection Plan, I really feel safer using the Fire. I was trully happy about the affordable price that I paid for the fire.  Im on a tight budget and it worked out just fine for me.  Thanks Amazon

Reviews.Title: Mayday feature is un-freaking-believable
Reviews.Author: Purple Yo
Reviews.Content: So, I'm having some trouble getting used to this kindle since I'm used to apple products, and I wasn't sure if I had the patience to learn it until I discovered and used the mayday feature.  I'm so sick of searching message boards every time I have a problem with an electronic device or electronic service of some sort.  When web-based technology works well, it is amazingly convenient, but when there is a problem with something you've come to depend on, it is so hard to get help.  Especially with a 2 year old tugging at your...everything.  However, the Mayday feature of my new kindle is fantastic.  To have a person who can hear your voice answer your questions immediately, and solve your issue within seconds is just invaluable to this busy mom.  No more email back and forth conversations with customer service reps that didn't read the entirety of my message or didn't answer my question fully, necessitating a problem solving session lasting for days.  A person and a voice that can respond immediately is a breath of fresh air.  I would have given the Kindle HDX 3 or 4 stars before using Mayday (mostly because I prefer the Mac look but and feel and probably should have bought an ipad mini) but this service is just so impressive and beats having to go to a genius bar and wait in line for 45 minutes or more that I'm completely sold on the Kindle.

Reviews.Title: Awesome!
Reviews.Author: Eva "Eva"
Reviews.Content: I absolutely love it!  The picture quality is awesome. I didn't realize it came with an app for the children. I love the way I get to control what they are able to do on it! I definitely want to get a Kindle for each of my children!

Reviews.Title: Upgraded from Kindle HD
Reviews.Author: Chuck Johnson
Reviews.Content: Upgraded from Kindle HD for the additional features.  The screen resolution is fantastic.  The sound while listening to audiobooks and movies is very good.  Would recommend the Kindle.

Reviews.Title: hey i can do it
Reviews.Author: randy
Reviews.Content: this 57 year old is not pc smart. but with the help of granddaughter showing me through the steps set up and downloads I feel comfortable with the kindle fire and kindle support was greatbut just fine any child that has a phone I pad etc and you got an instructor

Reviews.Title: I love my kindle
Reviews.Author: doreen
Reviews.Content: The HDX is awesome. Much better than the HD as far as screen resolution. I only wish I had purchased the larger size because this kindle is phenomenal. Easy to use, fast... love it!

Reviews.Title: didn't work for long
Reviews.Author: Biggi
Reviews.Content: Saved my money, bought my daughter an HD and myself and HDX for Christmas.Hers is still working though he volume is much quieter then that of the HDX version.Though I am not one to use a tablet for hours, I found it really easy to move around. I am sure there are still areas I have not explored yet nor know what to do. It will take some time to learn. Kindle is really a ease way to move around and learn.I owned a Nexxxus tablet before, gave it to my husband. It felt less personal.Kindle and connection with Amazon.com. I feel connected and great support.Sadly within 4 weeks my Kindle HDX just quit . Didn't turn on anymore. Amazon.com Kindle support was very helpful.Via phone they tried to boost it or whatever they did. But it did not work. So we agreed that I needed to ship it back.Here is where it becomes a bit odd.I told them I do not want a refurbished one. I paid for a new one and would like to have a new one.Though the agent agreed with me and assured me, when the replacement arrived, it said right on the box, refurbished one.Wow. But Amazon.com always is willing to work things out. Unfortunately in this case, the only thing that was left to do was to return the broken one, the replacement one and now order a brand new one.Apparently they are not sending out new ones to replace one.I will keep an eye on the sales. Hopefully I can purchase one soon.Love the HDX, love the service via amazon.com, but don't get that I can't get a new one as a replacement since I paid for a new one and it was only 4 weeks later that I had a problem.

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: Renee L Browell
Reviews.Content: I can do just about everything on this and I absolutely love it. Also it is light weight and very nice to read on,play games,watch movies,check e-mails, etc.

Reviews.Title: Fills the bill for almost everything
Reviews.Author: LINDA WEST
Reviews.Content: My husband bought this for me as a. Christmas present for lack of another idea.  It has been a great gift.  I can do everything on this that we do on the iPad. Yet small enough to fit in my purse and nice size keyboard.

Reviews.Title: Great investment
Reviews.Author: Kelly O'shaughnessy
Reviews.Content: I initially hesitated on upgrading my kindle to the Kindle HDX 7", but I am so glad I did! It is much more versatile then I expected. I am working n my master's degree and I was able to add several of my textbooks on the kindle. It is easy to navigate and I actually use it just as much if not more then my I-pad.

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: Sara Collins
Reviews.Content: The Kindle is everything it promised.  Amazon's service has been the very best possible.I absolutely recommend this tablet to everyone!

Reviews.Title: LOVE THIS!
Reviews.Author: NDT
Reviews.Content: I'm an avid Apple product user and not a fan of Android phone OS.  However, this product exceeds my expectations.  The color, brightness, clarity of display is just stunning.  The sound quality is also top notch.  The speed blew me away!  It moves from app to app with great speed.  I love the ability to highlight, write notes, etc. on books and PDF files.  I also like that there is a "on device" and "cloud" app storage so I can move apps to the Cloud when I don't want them for a time.  It's very light and easy to handle.  I like the swipe texting, also.  I'm not bothered by the special offers.  It's allowed me to catch some deals I may not have noticed otherwise.  It's ways to buy apps.  While the app store isn't up to par with Apple, it's been just fine so far.  There's Candy Crush, which is important, of course :) I own an iPad, too; but it's too big and heavy for me to read and use for school work.  So husband took ownership of that and I'm in love with my new Kindle.  Seriously.  Love it.  Got a Poetic magnetic cover and it works great!

Reviews.Title: Decent tablet
Reviews.Author: Jabez
Reviews.Content: Good tablet overall but the thing is the appstore its has about 10x less than the apple apps in the appstore

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire
Reviews.Author: Barbara C.
Reviews.Content: I love it!  For the price, it is a wonderful device. I purchased it because of it's e-reading ability, access to libraries, and facebook and email. Pandora is a plus. And, even though some difficulty, I transferred my I-tunes. I have a newer Mac, and my Mac does not recognize the device. However, that is not a reason to not purchase it. The picture is wonderful and the sound is incredible.

Reviews.Title: Not as good
Reviews.Author: Linda Comstock
Reviews.Content: I loved my previous Kindle Fire.  This new one, the Kindle Fire HDX, has the worst battery life I've ever seen. I KNOW there is better batteries Amazon could use, but I supposed you want us to just buy another Kindle when our current one dies.  As you're surfing the web or playing a game you can see the percentage of battery life constantly being drained; in 20 minutes it's drained 10% or more.  Have to charge it almost every day.  I don't expect this one to last as long as my first one.  Also, when I want a book to read, I scan the titles and click on the ones that look interesting to me, but when I go back to the previous page of the list of books, it doesn't take me back to where I was and I have to start scrolling through them again starting at the first one.  I miss being able to click on the top of the screen to get to settings.  Regarding email, several times now I've forwarded an email and it comes to ME from ME instead of the person I forwarded it to, and the original one I forwarded from has disappeared.  The lousy battery life is my main complaint, however.  My husband has an iPad, and he charges it maybe once a week.  Next time I'm buying an iPad.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 7"
Reviews.Author: Mary
Reviews.Content: I picked out this Kindle because of it's star rating. I am having a very hard time setting something's up, and understand something's, It would be so much nicer if this would of came with a manual. The camera just blow's my mind all I am doing is taking picture's of myself, I did not understand how I can take a picture of anything else, don't have a clue on how to delete them, have no idea on how to delete the free e-book's after I have read it. I would highly recommend this to someone that has knowledge of a mobile device. Since this being  my first mobile and without some kind of manual it is making it harder for me. Since I wrote this review I have found if you go to Amazon.com you will find a video on the Kindle and also information on operating different things. Hopefully in time I will know be able to understand more about this mobile device.

Reviews.Title: wonderful choice in reader
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: Terrific little reader.  I am constantly amazed by the features and the clarity of the screen. Some reviews find the blue line disturbing.  I had to remind myself to look for it the first few times I used the kindle.  I am very happy that these reviews did not stop me from this purchase. The sound quality is amazing.  However, I did find the "selfie" photo a little disturbing--the photo is so clear every line and wrinkle is enhanced.  I just avoid self photos.

Reviews.Title: KINDLE FIRE HDX
Reviews.Author: Thomas Hiday "HIDAYROZE"
Reviews.Content: MY WIFE LOVES HER NEW KINDLE FIRE HDX,NOW SHE HAS ALL HER E-BOOKS BACK ON HER TABLET AGAIN TO SEE WHAT SHE HAS READ.ALSO, LOVE THE WIFI IN THE NEW KINDLE. WOULD DEFINATELY RECOMMEND EVERYONE GET ONE OF THESE TABLETS. ALSO, LOVE AMAZON.COM A GREAT PLACE TO SHOP.AND AGAIN THANK YOU FOR SUCH FAST SERVICE.

Reviews.Title: Hallejuh !!
Reviews.Author: Ray Cartwright
Reviews.Content: After many efforts with PCs e readers etc. I saw the ad for kindle with may day and so far its what a dinosaur like I neededI don't know how you got the staff all of whom so far have made the use of kindle funThough I am proceeding slowly I have an inquisitive mind and plan to do my best to reap the benefits

Reviews.Title: LOVE, LOVE, LOVE IT!!!
Reviews.Author: Tonja Booth "Tonja R. Booth"
Reviews.Content: I had the Kindle 3G/WiFi keyboard, and I really love it when I got it.. I recently got the Kindle Fire HDX and I ABSOLUTELY LOVE IT!!  the picture on it is crystal clear, as well as the magazines. It is very easy to navigate. I was truly impressed that all my books from my old Kindle synced to the new one.  So glad that i finally purchased it.

Reviews.Title: Outstanding Gift
Reviews.Author: Peter Dunklin
Reviews.Content: Kindle Fire HDX was the gift of the year.  My spouse is really enjoying it, a lot more than the IPAD.

Reviews.Title: Great purchase, I use it at work a lot and it has proven very productive with the available tools.
Reviews.Author: MasterBlaster
Reviews.Content: Outstanding, I use it multiple times a day and it never ceases to amaze.  Only issues I can find, which are very minor:1.  Battery takes a while to charge with the stock charger; however, it does last a long time too.2.  No rear facing camera, not a huge deal but would be nice.3.  No external memory capability.  Not a huge issue with the 64 GB and you can still get files, etc.  to the device with the wireless.Those Items aside, I love it, love it, love it.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 7"
Reviews.Author: Kenneth D John
Reviews.Content: The Kindle Fire is just like my PC but no hard drive to worry about. That means no virus's to worry about. The Kindle does everything my PC can do, including printing on my wireless Printer.

Reviews.Title: GREAT SIZE!!
Reviews.Author: Sandie Johnson
Reviews.Content: Very easy to hold. Great clarity. Can use either my nails or finger tips when typing!!  Fits nicely in my purse so I can take anywhere.

Reviews.Title: My Kindle Fire
Reviews.Author: Sandra Irby
Reviews.Content: So much fun! I love the at the finger tips books and reviews. Easy to load apps and movies, check my email, surf internet. Skype, it is all here!

Reviews.Author: Lisa
Reviews.Content: I recommend Kindle Fire HDX to all my friends and family. It is the best device to take on the road!

Reviews.Title: Expected more than I got!
Reviews.Author: Chris Backeberg
Reviews.Content: The battery runs down very quickly, especially when the HDX is idle (not turned on)The Special offers - I expected a huge selection of free books - I am still searching

Reviews.Title: watch out on ipad because Kindle Fire is on fire
Reviews.Author: BigToe
Reviews.Content: it works great screen looks real good I just wish that I can switch the data when I'm in certain areas to work

Reviews.Title: love it!!!!
Reviews.Author: Elizabeth Petroff "Avid Online Shopper"
Reviews.Content: I rarely use my laptop now. I don't know how I ever got through life without one of these. Just too cool. And I don't know why anyone would pay extra NOT to have the special offers. I like them. I think they're cool. And helpful. And they're screen savers. But some are done in a really cool way. I just don't get it. My mom got one without the offers. Don't see the difference between them. Except for the screen savers ads. So what. Don't care. Love it!!!!UPDATE.......I get really cool ads when I turn on my kindle. Like, "free app for the day", or "how about this book, its on sale, learn more," okay I will!. Found an awesome book that way. Never would have found it any other way. Its called "Elimination Night". Written by Anonymous. So there's another reason why I don't mind the ads.

Reviews.Title: love it! just bought it yesterday
Reviews.Author: Alaska907 "Ed"
Reviews.Content: I have had the iPad mini, the iPad with retina display and love this tablet! It all depends on why you want the tablet. I wanted it primarily for reading and wanted a good tablet with retina display or better small and light. This fits the bill! I could not be happier. Other perks include the Facebook app, the Twitter app and email. Really, that's all anyone needs! Crystal clear light ebook reader!

Reviews.Title: Love my Kindle
Reviews.Author: Athena "Greek Goddess"
Reviews.Content: Not sure how I lived without this thing before LOL! I know it's sad that book stores are becoming as old as dinosaurs, but how nice is it to take one device and have your entire library at your finger tips! It's super cool for cookbooks because I can add my modification notes right to the recipes! I also do a lot of book reviewing directly to authors and I can make my notes in the book as I go along. I can sit in the dark and read, or outside in the sun and have no problems. Love it!

Reviews.Title: This was a gift from my son.
Reviews.Author: Pete Peterson
Reviews.Content: I am a 84 year old first time user of such a product.  In the short time since receiving the Kindle I am very well satisfied.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: kylayda
Reviews.Content: Cause I have one it is very fun to play with and it is hd plus It as all the games u would want to play except for flappy bird

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 7"
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: I am very pleased with my new Kindle. I bought my first Kindle several years ago and the improvement over the years is awesome. I would just like to trade in my old Kindles as I upgrade.

Reviews.Title: not for me
Reviews.Author: lee thomas
Reviews.Content: Not versatile at all and if you want something that is usegull without a WiFi as well, look elsewhere. wife likes it for parental controls, games and books. I went with much more capable Asus nexus. Same price but more uses, especially off line.

Reviews.Title: A Happy Skeptic
Reviews.Author: Schean
Reviews.Content: I was skeptical about purchasing a Kindle.  I'm a big Samsung fan and have recommended the Galaxy Tab and Note to more than just a few family and friends.  However, a really good friend of mine has been using her kindle for a few years now so I thought I'd give it a try.The Kindle Fire HDX is everything she said it was and more.  The display is incredibly brilliant, the sound is great, the battery life is excellent and it has an awesome selection of apps available through Amazon.  Bang for the buck....it's a great deal.  I take it with me everywhere.

Reviews.Title: Better than IPAD!
Reviews.Author: Guy Mitchell
Reviews.Content: My wife has an IPAD and i bought this for academic reasons because I am a graduate student, but this purchase had turned out better than expected. The size of the kindle fire is more convenient as it rest gently in your hands, the great visuals, and awesome price make this a great buy.

Reviews.Title: Great replacement for my Kindle Fire
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: The HDX functions similar to my smartphone so was easy to acclimate to.  Everything is user-friendly.  Vivd colors on the screen are brilliant and beautiful.  There are differences from my Kindle Fire, and the differences are all improvements.  Happy with this new and improved Kindle Fire HDX 7".

Reviews.Title: Love my Kindle
Reviews.Author: Teutonic Lady "Victoria"
Reviews.Content: Now I can watch my favorite programs and movies while lying in bed or sitting down, can answer emails, and even surf the net, but the biggest thing that it's done is that I am really reading again.  Should actually get the paperwhite as it would be even easier on the eyes.I have a very nice router, and it's sorely needed if you want to stream movies, and it really works beautifully, but if I were buying it for a friend, I would pay the extra so I could use it anywhere.

Reviews.Title: Granddaughter loves it, but
Reviews.Author: Caroline Ellis
Reviews.Content: My granddaughter doesn't live with me, so I haven't personally used it - she loves it, however, I had to input my credit card information for her to download free apps and I'm not happy about that.

Reviews.Title: Definitely better than iPad
Reviews.Author: Gardenwitch
Reviews.Content: I have both an iPad 2 and just got a Kindle Fire HD.....no contest.  Love the 7" Kindle and the resolution is fantastic.  Wifi is much faster and love the ability to use Android voice input.  Still getting used to the features, but it's fun to explore.

Reviews.Title: Why I love my Kindle Fire HDX
Reviews.Author: Connie S. Gray
Reviews.Content: I love my Kindle Fire HDX, it is easy to use and has great graphics.The only issue I have is the front facing camera, a total waste.  It would be better if it were rear facing, then you wouldn't have to struggle to stay out of the picture.But, everything else about the Fire HDX, I absolutely love.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire Oh Yea!
Reviews.Author: barefoot
Reviews.Content: I was hard pressed to give up my new kindle fire 7" hdx, certainly because it was a christmas gift from my wife. But I found out a few things about my phone provider when they wanted me to exchange my kindle fire for their tablet. Not only was i being scammed But was informed later... and was able to get out of it before the very short dead line contract expired. I'm glad very glad in fact that I didn't give up my Kindle Fire or return it. It's very fast and it's all I need. Glad I didn't screw up there. I really like this tablet it's my 1st been following this for awhile and when during christmas if you was a store card holder you could by this shipping free for 179.00 what a deal! wow! no regrets here.

Reviews.Title: Perfect for my uses-The Kindle Fire has reinvented its best with the HDX
Reviews.Author: Swtbear13
Reviews.Content: I had the Kindle fire for about a year and a half. I loved it but needed more memory quickly enough. When I saw the new HDX had 64 gb available it had my attention but I was skeptical about how different they could possibly be.Well I am here to tell you that the quality has greatly improved. The screen is noticably more clear when comparing the two. Also the HDX is considerably lighter- so much so that when I put the HDX into a case with a wireless bluetooth keyboard included it was still lighter than my original HD.The sound quality is what I expected and I havent tested the range of the wifi but as of now I have never had a problem with connecting with a wifi signal.Battery life is as advertised and works well for me because I take my HDX to class and type notes for my courses with it.Overall I am thrilled with this product and everyday I try to find new ways to use it!

Reviews.Title: It's Perfect
Reviews.Author: Vnyrdstar
Reviews.Content: All I can say, is I ended up buying TWO the 7" for my son and then the 8"9 for myself. I know people who have Ipads but why pay more for pretty much the same thing. And, I use Amazon for so much more. I also have a dell xps that doesn't fit into my purse. We are so happy with our Kindles we can read, watch and purchase anything, anywhere we want. We wouldn't be caught without them, and we don't have to. Yeah !!

Reviews.Title: camera
Reviews.Author: Jeanie Ely
Reviews.Content: I got this as a xmas gift.  I was disapointed that it has a front facing camera instead of a rear facing camera.  All I can take pictures of is whoever is holding the Kindle.

Reviews.Title: I LOVE my Kindle Fire HDX
Reviews.Author: Jane Coleman
Reviews.Content: I love the clarity of the pictures!  Reading with my Kindle Fire HDX is truly a wonderful experience.  I can even read easily in the dark, so there is no need to turn on the lights when I want to read at night.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Just-a-Guy
Reviews.Content: I purchased this for my wife for Christmas. I waited until now to wright the review so I could judge it for my self. So far I have only had it in my hands once and briefly.  It is awesome. Don't waist your money on an Ipad.

Reviews.Title: Really like it but a few things ...
Reviews.Author: Tiya Basilio
Reviews.Content: I have an ipad and the Kindle fire ...and I by far like the Kindle.I like how easy it is to find movies, magazines and music.Some of the CONS are the placement of the power and volume buttons. It was difficult to use the buttons when it was in the case.Also, I wish it had wall papers to customize. Other than that, I really liked this product.

Reviews.Title: Might not be better than HD
Reviews.Author: Ejlumley
Reviews.Content: We bought two new Kindle HD's and one HDX.  The HDX seems to be a better tablet but it is hard to pinpoint the differences between the two. The screens seems the same, the apps are the same, and the only thing we can notice different is the camera.  The HD would probably be the better deal being the price is much lower for virtually the same product.  My other complaint would be with the Prime shipping.  It took a week longer to receive than what Prime promised.  This seems to be happening a lot lately with our purchases and I am having a hard time justifying paying for the Prime membership if I'm not getting my products on time.

Reviews.Title: Stunning Display On a Quality Product
Reviews.Author: MTCUBED66
Reviews.Content: I have been using another brand tablet for about a year. I decided, because of battery issues with the old tablet, to buy a new one. I did quite a bit of research and decided on the Kindle Fire HDX. Boy am I glad I did! The quality of graphics is superb. My old tablet looks like crap after seeing the quality of this Kindle. It is very "user friendly". I thought I might need to buy a book to help me figure it out, but it is pretty straightforward and there is a help function built in. It is sooooo faaaaaast!!!! I am loading apps in 1 second compared to 10 or 15 seconds. I guess that is the difference between the dual core and quad core. I already had most of my apps from the Amazon App Store, so that was a bonus. This tablet comes pre-installed with the Amazon App Store (which gives away one free app of the day FAOTD every day). Transferring to the new tablet was almost seamless. You have the option at setup to become an Amazon Prime member, which would be good if you like to watch TV episodes or movies (one free month, then pay). Amazon Customer Service is fantastic too!! Maybe some of the people that complain about it would complain about anything, no matter what! I found Amazon Customer Service knowledgeable, kind, FAST with helping. All around, a very good investment. This is a good quality product. By the way, the accessories offered for this tablet are fantastic too!

Reviews.Title: My friend is a happy camper!
Reviews.Author: Patsy Spratt
Reviews.Content: I gave it to a 75 year old friend as a gift, and he can't put his new Kindle Fire HD 7" down. He tells me every day how much he is enjoying it's ease of use and all the new things he's learning to do each time he opens his Kindle!Got my first Kindle as a Christmas gift from my children several years ago. I had to have the new Kindle HD when it came out and love the many upgraded features.  I never thought I'd give up the touch and feel of a real book, but I'm here to tell you, my Kindle library is bursting at the seams with good books to enjoy at my leisure. I, too, am a happy camper!

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire
Reviews.Author: Ann Harris
Reviews.Content: Love it, just wish I had ordered the bigger screen.  But, love watching movies, color is excellent, clear picture. Sound is great.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire is awesome!
Reviews.Author: Kristin Fagan
Reviews.Content: I bought this Kindle for my boyfriend who had a very old version of the Kindle.  He travels a lot and loves to read.  This one allows him to connect to emails, surf the web, read his papers and books and more!  The screen is a perfect size, speed and the resolution rocks. 2 thumbs up!

Reviews.Title: Love it!!
Reviews.Author: Ann S
Reviews.Content: I am really enjoying my new kindle fire. It is very easy to use. I like that you can customize it to your likes and dislikes. Thanks for a wonderfully priced product.

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: Christina Rardin
Reviews.Content: I love it.  Easy to use, lots of apps, light weight, and the screen is very clear.  You should really get a case for it because it is really thin.

Reviews.Title: wait before you buy
Reviews.Author: Travis T. Foss
Reviews.Content: Wait before they improve it before you buy. First, it doesn't have many apps you probably want. My bank app isn't available (capital one).  No YouTube app. No podcast player app. My favorite game app doesn't make them for the kindle. No decent weather apps are available. Second, you are stuck with the kindle browser, Silk. No chrome, Firefox, atomic, or safari. Silk is an ok browser but it doesn't handle embedded video very well. Lots of freezing and unexpected hangs. Bookmarks are awkward. Third, the touch screen is glitchier than my iPad. The cursor jumps around randomly. Good luck getting the cursor to go where you want it to when typing. Fourth, it's not easy to switch between apps. The OS stores everything in memory and the performance suffers if you use too many apps, and there's no way to close the ones you aren't using. I found myself shutting it down and restarting frequently. Fifth, a big selling point was the "one free rental book a month" deal with the kindle. But the selection is SMALL and it's impossible to search the lending library. Amazon sells the "lending library" hard, but it's clear it's not ready for primetime. Finally, some of my favorite websites are slow and glitchy with the silk browser (like slate).  The browser often hangs for no reason, even when my broadband is working fine.More rrestarting.

Reviews.Title: It was a gift for my mom, but I love it too....
Reviews.Author: Cujodu
Reviews.Content: It was a gift for my mom, and a replacement for her original kindle.  But let me tell you why it's amazing for a 70-year-old... the button that brings up the Amazon rep to take care of any problems.  If every electronic device had that button I would never again have to fix my mom's computer, iPod, telephone, or etc. problems.  That would be heaven.

Reviews.Title: Overal disappointed.
Reviews.Author: drachehexe
Reviews.Content: I got this because my Android phone's screen was too small for reading and some gaming and note taking.  This is great for reading and web-surfing, in games tho the menu tab in full screen games gets in the way a lot of the time, especially the hidden object games where the tab can cover something you need to click on preventing you from progressing.I also don't like the limitations of setting up your home screen.  There is VERY little customization, my android phone is much more user interface friendly, this, this is just messy.If you can manage through the funky menu system it's a good device, good reader, good gamer, good surfer, just lousy interface, not overly user friendly at all.

Reviews.Title: Very nice tablet.
Reviews.Author: Dan R. Mason
Reviews.Content: This tablet is an upgrade from my 7 inch Kindle Fire HD. I think this tablet is great with just one negative. I prefer the speakers at the end of the tablet like on the old Kindle Fire HD. However, this tablet is so much faster and with the 64 GB of storage I can do so much more.

Reviews.Title: Xmas Gift for My Wife
Reviews.Author: Myron B.
Reviews.Content: I only have used it once, but my wife is on it all day long.  We are a five Kindle household (of 2) and this Kindle is the best to date.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire 7"
Reviews.Author: Alvin C. Fogelman "onlineshopper"
Reviews.Content: I have found this to be very convenient for traveling. It is so much less bulky. for transporting. My only regret is that I couldn't afford to purchase the 8" at the time.

Reviews.Title: kindle review
Reviews.Author: Dolly
Reviews.Content: I absolutely loved my original kindle fire,but the kindle fire HDX is amazing,the graphics are so clear.I compared it to the picture on my original kindle and there is a big difference.the May day feature is a life saver for someone who doesn't know how to do very much on a computer.the people who answer your call are wonderful,they are so patient and knowledgeable.lts a great machine,I highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Very disappointed.
Reviews.Author: pjhempe2
Reviews.Content: I really like the smaller size from my iPad, however am very disappointed in the camera. I had hoped I would be able to use it to take pictures and video as well as use it for video chat. I returned it and most likely not get the 8.9 because it is not as compact.

Reviews.Title: Great, but needs a couple small tweeks
Reviews.Author: Stan
Reviews.Content: Just needs flash support and a way to reset the "free time" parent password if you forget it. You have to reset the device if you ever forget your password and you'll lose all your apps. Otherwise it's a great little machine!

Reviews.Title: I love it!
Reviews.Author: E. Hoogland
Reviews.Content: I thought it would be difficult giving up "real" books, but my Kindle is wonderful--I wish I hadn't waited so long to get one. And the features of the Kindle Fire are just enough for me (not too overwhelming for a 60-something)!

Reviews.Title: Very, Very  Disappointed!
Reviews.Author: Nichole Zackos
Reviews.Content: I previously owned the original kindle fire which I loved. When I purchased this one the kindle fire HDX I thought it would be as great or better than first one but I was actually disappointed .  My major issues with this kindle are ...The battery  takes so long to charge, dies extremely fast, and even when plugged in does not charge while in use. My previous kindle charged quickly even in use and had an amazing battery life!  I even called customer service and they said there's was a problem with it. Guess what? When I was sent the new one it worked just as bad as before.My next issue is What happened to flash player?!  My old kindle has it! And now when I go to watch certain shows I used to watch or when I go to amazon to view a product video I can't view it anymore!!Next ..  i used to watch the network apps such as the cw ect..  on my previous tablet and still do with no problems. but when i watch them on my HDX they time out whenever the commercial break happens, I have to actually exit the app ,go into my wifi , turn it off, and then back on again to get it to work! Once back in i have to fast foward to where i left off ! This is something i also asked about when in called customer service and was told it was the kindle and my internet. if this were true then why does it work perfectly on the old kindle? Again got the new HDX replaced and still have same issue to this day. It's not my Internet !  I've even been to places that only use one device in there home and have way better internet than me and my kindle still does this ! It was a huge disappointment!In my opinion they took more away and only added a camera.  If they keep this up I don't think I'll be buying anymore kindles in the future. Its sad cause I really did like them and thought the gave apple a good competitor.

Reviews.Title: My favorite toy
Reviews.Author: Mark "mkw"
Reviews.Content: I have lots of electronics, but this is my favorite one.  I use it every day.  I used to think that I preferred to read books on paper, but with this it is far easier.  I especially enjoy reading in bed and don't have to worry about a light disturbing my wife- plus, I use it to do crosswords, Sudoku, check my trading account during the day and more.  Frankly, I like it more than my IPad- it is smaller and easier to carry, and since it cost about 2/3 less, I don't worry about it getting damaged or stolen and I feel like I can take it everywhere.

Reviews.Title: best thing to ever be able use in one hand besides a taser in dangerous situation
Reviews.Author: Fadzli Fauzi
Reviews.Content: I've had a huge decision to make between the sub 8inch competitors and I admit, I'm a little bored of having what everyone has so, here I am with a completely new ecosystem that doesn't come with a huge learning curve. Although the restrictions in terms of customization is limited, it gives quality software in return. It's been 3 months now and I must say I'm very impressed especially when I have people come over and try. The first thing they'll be shocked by is the beautiful screen.They've done everything right with the hardware. It's fast and I'm quite sure it'll be future proof for a couple of years. I take this everywhere with me on assignments.The media content from Amazon is 2nd to none. Everyone knows that so I won't get into it. I'm a huge consumer of great music.I gave it a 4 stars because of the lack of information about the gps functionality. I was led to believe it might have one and till now, I don't have clear information about it and because of that, I feel I still need to look for another device all because of one missing functionality.

Reviews.Title: Kindle hurray
Reviews.Author: Margarita Saez
Reviews.Content: I chose this rating because the kindle is amazing!!!!it is great to get every movie you wanton is awesome for me

Reviews.Title: awsum,so worth the buy
Reviews.Author: dkremm
Reviews.Content: It's a wonderfully put together electronic book/tablet/calendar/travail alarm clock/journal/video phone/t.v./game console. The screen is crisp and shap, the sound is comparable to a small t.v., and personalizing was a breeze. Navigating thru the apps and all initial set up is very user friendly.The only drawback is the inability to use Google play apps and Google music player( no feeling lucky)Definitely worth the price,especially as its replaced a few other items that I no longer have to find a way to carry; a notebook,, calendar, books I'm reading, language dictionary.

Reviews.Title: My Tablet
Reviews.Author: carmen rosengarten
Reviews.Content: I really like my Kindle, especially I can get books on free to read and play games which I don't have to use really money.  It is a good cheap entertainment to me.

Reviews.Title: Excellent!
Reviews.Author: Donna G.
Reviews.Content: Easy to use. The graphics are great. The battery life is excellent.  I love everything about my new Kindle Fire HDX.

Reviews.Title: Nice
Reviews.Author: kimberly Persinger
Reviews.Content: I like my Kindle Fire but I wish that I could have my own photo as the screen saver other than that it's nice.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Tracy Genet
Reviews.Content: I can't believe how fast my Kindle fire HDX is, it's amazing. I don't believe there is a better tablet out there, especially for the price.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX
Reviews.Author: Alex Baker
Reviews.Content: Great electronic. If I don't play my videogames games, I still get to use an electronic. Without games of course. I like the reading part the most

Reviews.Title: Fabulous!!!
Reviews.Author: Lisa Johnson
Reviews.Content: Best purchase I've made for a portable device!!!  It's home when I'm away from home and love having the available apps, movies and music!!

Reviews.Title: Awesome, kids love it. Great for parents.
Reviews.Author: Jeremy Francis
Reviews.Content: Could not believe all the capabilities of the Kindle.  Prefer this over all others.  Has exactly what my family needs in a portable device.

Reviews.Title: Pretty Happy with it!
Reviews.Author: AJ
Reviews.Content: At first, I wasn't going to buy one, but now I'm glad I did. The screen is vibrant, it has enough horsepower to multitask and open apps quickly, and they run without flaws. I use it quite a bit, for games, movies, music, netflix.The battery usually lasts all day on a full charge, and its nice to lay in bed and skype with my friends.However, there are a few little things that keep it from being perfect. When reading ebooks or viewing an all-white page theres a blue tint at the edges of the screen. A quick google search shows that this is pretty common and has to do with the LED backlight. Mine also has the screen flicker bug, but in my case it's tied to high processor usage - on certain games it will flicker for a moment or two, but a reboot fixes it.Overall, the negatives are tolerable and the good greatly outweighs it.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Product
Reviews.Author: Fabiola Narvaez
Reviews.Content: This is a good product that was I expected to be because it has a better screen and more features than any other tablet.

Reviews.Title: Great Buy
Reviews.Author: mary
Reviews.Content: Really enjoy it. Love getting free Prime streaming videos. Enjoying Downtown Abbey for the first time. Also love Fashioning and web surfing on it.

Reviews.Title: my Kindle!!!
Reviews.Author: Sharon Colburn
Reviews.Content: I just love, the color and graphics are excellent. Not sure still how to use everything yet, but I'll learn.

Reviews.Title: I LOVE MY KINDLE!!!
Reviews.Author: Shawna
Reviews.Content: I love my kindle, I used to have the Kindle HD but I easily upgraded before my insurance ran out. It's extremely faster now, light weight, the screen is amazingly clear. And the battery life is the best I have ever had. Honestly I love my kindle very much, and so does my boyfriend who always take it from me haha. So if you're thinking of this product to read, go online, play games, etc it is perfect! I highly recommend this product to anyone. Not even including the great price for this item, I got it on sale for $199 which made it even better. I'm completely satisfied.

Reviews.Title: Best toy ever!
Reviews.Author: Camp Follower "Catriona"
Reviews.Content: My family chose the Kindle Fire HDX 7 over an Ipad mini for my Christmas gift and I am so glad they did. The Kindle works intuitively -- I am a Baby Boomer and electronics do not come easy to me, but the Kindle does. And the special offers make fun screen savers that I ignore or check out at will -- completely non-intrusive.

Reviews.Title: not playing videos
Reviews.Author: trinitechi
Reviews.Content: I thought that I would finally have a convenient way to watch my favourite shows online....I'm yet to be able to see even one episode. They do not play. It works very well for music, reading docucuments and general web page browsing mhm habit video watching I is quite unreliable. I still have to use my slow old computer.

Reviews.Title: What a fantastic unit !
Reviews.Author: KatsRule
Reviews.Content: I loved my first generation kindle fire...and just wanted the better display and sound that I read about in reviews.I am so happy I decided to buy this light weight product...that is so easy to carry...I take it to work in my lunch bag everyday. It is so nice to use the free wifi at the college I go to as a worker....and share the movies in HD content and loud sound..often I haveseveral fellow employees watching over my shoulder ..and I have to just laugh each time. We all enjoy this productsfeatures..crisp clear high definition video and fast wifi play down...(playdown means it does not skip in the wifi, always giving a constant uninterrupted video right off a fast speed internet..  I use wifi...).I actually bought two units.  .  . and both my wife and I sit almost all night playing free downloaded games from the Amazon App Store...and we are simply GLUED to these tablets.  Our best apps include.. The weather channel..Amazon free App Games...our outside home security cameras...(which I can view anywhere at anytime in the world on this unit)...  I love how where ever I go..if there is free wifi near me..the kindle fire hdx  automatically connects with my permission...and I zoom off to never never land onto the internet/movies/weather conditions/local and world news.  I simply just LOVE this Kindle Fire HDX 7" Display, Wi-Fi , 16 GB - Included Special Offers.  WE LOVE IT !

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: Cari
Reviews.Content: Expected this to be like my older kindle.  A great and easy way to purchase and read books.  What I got was actually a tablet.  I haven't needed to touch my home computer since I first turned my kindle fire on.  Love it.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 7"
Reviews.Author: Jim in Calimesa
Reviews.Content: I am delighted with my new Kindle Fire HDX 7"!  I purchase and read books--without accumulating physical books to crowd shelves and require an addition to my home!  I watch wonderful high definition movies and other programming--even in bed.  The brightness and clarity of the screen are amazing.  The volume really surprised me--no need for earbuds.  The battery just seems to go on forever... There are so many uses I haven't even explored.  What a wonderful device for education and entertainment!

Reviews.Title: My first Kindle!
Reviews.Author: Glenda Seay
Reviews.Content: It's my first Kindle, so I don't have anything to compare it to, but I think it's going to be great.  I have eye problems and I love that you can enlarge the print.  Since it's still new to me, I am still learning about it.  I'm certainly impressed thus far!

Reviews.Title: kindle my fourth
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: would have given it a five except for how to start with it.  took a while to get it up and running.  Still not able  to get my email account but will keep trying.  Great for reading my books and some items from amazon.

Reviews.Title: Education assistant
Reviews.Author: Zumba Kelly
Reviews.Content: This device is pretty easy to use & it keeps my 8 yr old entertained with games and books....if it helps me get her reading it gets points in my book!!!!

Reviews.Title: Stunning
Reviews.Author: kpal
Reviews.Content: I truly love it!!! But difficult finding Wi-Fi when you live in such a rural area and have  none within miles. wish it came with 3g like my older Kindle....overall a hit!!

Reviews.Title: love it!!
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: Kindle fire was exactly what I needed!I love I can take my books everywhere with me! Exactly what I need on my trips!

Reviews.Title: loving it
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer "Keitha S. Joseph"
Reviews.Content: the size is just right for me, small, light and the features are great. the screen quality is exceptional. would definitely recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Love it!!
Reviews.Author: Darline Valcin "cheloo"
Reviews.Content: This was a birthday gift from my husband and also an up grade from my older kindle. It is easier to maneuver on the fire compared to the older version I have. My daughter also enjoys it because her books are in color and not black and white.

Reviews.Title: Very pleased!
Reviews.Author: Suzie Evans
Reviews.Content: Love the screen.. So much easier on the eyes. I have a samsung galaxy tab, I prefer the kindle by far.

Reviews.Title: Having a Kindle Hdx 32Gb Is great
Reviews.Author: melvena Francise
Reviews.Content: I wasn't sure I really wanted this But now that I have it aND i'M LEARNING TO USE IT. It is fun and entertaining. I like hav ing it when I go to bed and there isn't anything I want to see on TV.

Reviews.Title: THE BEST TABLET THEIR IS
Reviews.Author: Dale Evans
Reviews.Content: Unbelievably fantastic it works perfectly and the resolution is phenominal, thank you KINDLE? I also have an IPad and this unit is superior in clarity and design, shouldn`t have died STEVE.

Reviews.Title: It's ok, not the best choice tho
Reviews.Author: Makayla Wright
Reviews.Content: I had a kindle fire for about 1-2 months when I decided to return. It just doesn't have a lot of apps such as Instagram, snapchat, and more. This is definetly not for teens, but more for younger kids.

Reviews.Title: Needs some upgrades.
Reviews.Author: Jumpnlab
Reviews.Content: Needs expandable memory. And an origami case that doesn't shut the kindle off in the middle of a book.  Not to happy.

Reviews.Title: Kindle
Reviews.Author: Terri
Reviews.Content: Have really enjoyed my Kindle Fire HDX. I wanted to use it as my camera as well, but camera is not on the outside. Dislike this very much. That was actually the main reason for this.

Reviews.Title: I love this device
Reviews.Author: Kenneth Modeste
Reviews.Content: The display is superb and the WiFi works brilliantly all over the house. My Nexus loses WiFI connection and this devices manages to continue to play Hulu with me at a great distance from the router

Reviews.Title: My Kindle does everything!
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: I am in love with my HDX. My Husband purchased a fire for me as a birthday gift almost 2 years ago and I wanted to purchase the Kindle Fire for our Daughter for Christmas.  I got her the HDX and fell in love with it so I kept it!

Reviews.Title: Great !!
Reviews.Author: Kathleen Jones
Reviews.Content: I love my Kindle Fire HDX 7".  I have arthritis in my hands so it is perfect for me. It is easy to use and such a clear picture.

Reviews.Title: Good, but still not an iPad
Reviews.Author: RodLefty
Reviews.Content: Wanted to try a platform other than iOS. Chose Kindle over straight Android device. No problem with the limitations like Google Play. Can work around that. Really like the quick access to buying things on Amazon. I'm sure they like that too. But the touch sensitivity doesn't seem as clean as our iPads -- various generations and sizes. Silk doesn't always seem as fast as advertised. Also I like to close apps when not using them and that's not nearly as straightforward as the iPad approach. Battery life doesn't seem to be what I'd expected, but am trying to learn how to manage that. Finally, transferring things from iPad or iMac Pro to the Kindle is a snap. That's nice.

Reviews.Title: Looks great...but
Reviews.Author: j mann
Reviews.Content: I originally had a Kindle Fire which I loved!  This Fire HDX... not so much.  For one,  the reading screen is difficult.  The black of words just seems to fade into background.  I can't seem to get a comfortable reading screen.  Since receiving this at Christmas, I have not read at all on this device; I have only done emails, the web and games.  Reading screen hurts my eyes.  The other major issue is the screen continually freezes.  That happened only occasionally with the Fire.  With those issues in mind, I cannot give this device a 4 or 5 star rating.  I did a lot of research before I chose this particular Kindle.  I remember reading about the reading screen but thought it couldn't be that bad since the Kindle Fire was so adjustable.  Not this one!

Reviews.Title: where is my game??
Reviews.Author: Peggy S. Ross
Reviews.Content: I was very disappointed to find that I cannot play pet rescue saga on my kindle! It is a "King" game, as is the candy crush game, so I'm not understanding why you can get one and not the other! I love reading my books and using it for email,  Facebook, etc

Reviews.Title: The Kindle is a fantastic storybook
Reviews.Author: Deanna Hess
Reviews.Content: I am just getting to use it after the hustle and bustle of the season.  I am disappointed the camera  is only one way.  I would not have purchased it if I had known this.  Otherwise, I do like it alot.

Reviews.Title: Love, love, love it!
Reviews.Author: Tina
Reviews.Content: My first Kindle was great but this one is greater!! The display is crisp and clear and I don't think its bigger but it sure feels like it! It's easy to use and my favorite feature is the volume control button - much easier than trying to get to the slider on the screen, it's an actual upgrade. My only problem is keeping my husband from "borrowing" it like he did the first (which is now his) one!! If you're ready for an upgrade this is it!

Reviews.Title: Kindle hdx
Reviews.Author: George
Reviews.Content: Excellent graphics, print quality.  Mayday feature is incredible.  Lightweight compared top Apple products.Downside....battery life is about six hours of  use, not the 11 as advertised.  Haven't tried the book reading yet, which is supposed to be 17.  If the battery life is only 11 with the wifi off, not on the note rent, that should be explained.  Much of the use so far has been for downloaded games, but the wifi is still on.  Maybe something is wrong with the battery, but annoying to have to charge so often.  Reset the sleep time to one minute.  Doesn't seem to make a lot of difference.Overall, other than the battery life, really cool device

Reviews.Title: From Kindle Touch user
Reviews.Author: Roger VanGordon
Reviews.Content: The color and clarity of the HDX is pretty amazing. Processing speed is far beyond any device I have used to date and works pretty much as advertised. Not fond of there only being a forward facing camera. Not into selfies. I liked the Kindle Touch better for reading in normal light but is nice to be able to read in a lower light with the HDX. Blue outline while reading is not an issue for me just have a difficulty in the back-lit screen, but sure I will become accustomed in time. Over all it is a great device am glad I bought it. Angled power, micro USB, port is taking some practice as well as finding power button. Also battery life is much shorter than I would like though it is probably as good as any other tablet or perhaps better.I would recommend this device to my friends.

Reviews.Title: Great device
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: This is a great device. I use it for reading, notes, and games. It is not as fast as my old iPad but for the cost difference it is not a bad trade of. It is not as heavy as my iPad. It fits in my purse do I can read wherever I go. The only thing that disappoints is the camera. I wish it had a rear facing camera so that I could take pictures.

Reviews.Title: improve some of the apps available
Reviews.Author: Rebecca Beckley
Reviews.Content: For one thing, I have Netflix on my smart phone and it has a wide variety of movies on it...but when I go to watch them on my kindle...the same choice movies are not offered.

Reviews.Title: Email not working
Reviews.Author: BARBARA LEAVY
Reviews.Content: One of the reasons I upgraded to the Kindle Fire was to have the ability to check my email without going to my computer. So far the 'Mayday' folks and the developers have not been able to resolve the connection problem that appears to be on their end according to the head of my IT department. Major disappointment.

Reviews.Title: Just one thing
Reviews.Author: Mark R. Crist
Reviews.Content: The only thing I wish the Kindle Fire had was a USB port for a jump drive. Otherwise I love it!

Reviews.Title: Love my Kindle HDX
Reviews.Author: Billie
Reviews.Content: It can do anything my laptop does.  The picture is great and I love the HELP button and getting to talk personally with someone for trouble shooting.

Reviews.Title: I love the Kindle fire hdx
Reviews.Author: David C Wilson
Reviews.Content: Easy-to-use and nice to read on, the 7" screen is perfect and it is super fast. It also has a very impressive battery life.

Reviews.Title: I love my kindle
Reviews.Author: Elaine Toppin
Reviews.Content: I love my kindle, I just wish I could get to read more I am now enjoying the book I'm reading...

Reviews.Title: Simple, elegant, usable.
Reviews.Author: Oneyedphotog
Reviews.Content: This Kindle Fire HDX is simply perfect for me.  I use it mainly for reading, watching videos from prime, surfing the web and of course playing Angry Birds but not necessarily all in that order.  The "Silk" browser is aptly named as it is rather silky web browsing much improved from my first generation Fire.  The screen is really brilliant and the colors are very rich even when it is in low bright mode; I use the auto brightness most of the time.  The sound quality is good and the size of the tablet is nice as well.  It's built to be dedicated to Amazon services but I uses those services so it fits me fine.  The price is really perfect and it offers a lot in a good package.  I'm very happy with it; not a replacement for my Mac but it is perfect for what it is designed for.

Reviews.Title: this devise is AWESOME
Reviews.Author: Maggie Wendtland
Reviews.Content: I love how this works almost just like a phone but it has its own way of doing it!!!(plz add more games like hay day!!)

Reviews.Title: more camera angles
Reviews.Author: Myron L. Dent Sr.
Reviews.Content: great graphics only thing missing it for dual camera angles, ie. camera on back side so you can watch what ur recording or capturing

Reviews.Title: My all time favorite
Reviews.Author: Maria G Varguez Rivas
Reviews.Content: It's very light in weight very clear screen easy to use great for Skype fun to use just great to have

Reviews.Title: A-
Reviews.Author: Sasa Nedic
Reviews.Content: So far so good. Two things i wish for; needs more apps and longer battery life. Other than that a nice tool.

Reviews.Title: Great product!
Reviews.Author: SUSAN M MYERS
Reviews.Content: Easy to navigate. Sharp picture quality. Lots of storage. Lightweight and slim. Only wish is that it came with instruction book.

Reviews.Title: What  a value.
Reviews.Author: Johnny Taylor
Reviews.Content: I have thoroughly enjoyed all of the features that my Kindle fire HD has to offer. The screen clarity is amazing and all of the options that customize my reading experience. I'm very pleased !!

Reviews.Title: I love it
Reviews.Author: Rozita Bozhinova
Reviews.Content: I got my Kindle Fire as a Christmas gift from my husband and I found it is so useful for me- light, bright, keeping me connect to Internet, able to read without glasses :), and easy fit in my pocket or/and bag.

Reviews.Title: Love!
Reviews.Author: Jmar
Reviews.Content: I love my kindle fire hdx! It's very easy to navigate. It's makes reading so much better than just picking up a book.

Reviews.Title: Nice Gadget!
Reviews.Author: Mrs. LaNeka Hale
Reviews.Content: This a great tablet for surfing the web, reading, & playing games. It comes in handy when you are lying in bed or lounding around on the sofa. If you do not want to go and sit at your desk top, this will be perfect. It is sleek and easy to hold in hands especially if you purchase the case (Supcase) with the insert for your hand. Also the resolution is superb. It has a crystal clear picture view. The only reason I gave it 4stars is because when trying to connect to WiFi away from home can be somewhat a drag.

Reviews.Title: great device for a great price!!
Reviews.Author: Jordyn
Reviews.Content: Love love love my kindle fire HDX! I used to have an iPad, however reading on it always gave me a headache so I turned to kindle! Now I can read for hours in the light or dark and the screen never gives me any issues. Another good thing compared to the iPad is reading in the sun, no problem for the kindle...good luck with the iPad and your shades on. Just not gonna happen. The kindle has just as many apps as the iPadand the screen resolution is better than the iPad. The battery lasts really long as well!! I use my kindle for everything from emails to facebook to reading my favorite books!! I'll never go back to the iPad!

Reviews.Title: The best Kindle yet
Reviews.Author: Ronald G. Glover
Reviews.Content: I am a voracious reader, as is my wife.  We each have Kindle E-readers.  She likes her Paperwhite Kindle very much, but when I had one, I did not care for it.  I borrowed my Granddaughter's first generation Kindle Fire and liked it, so bought a first generation Kindle Fire HD.  I liked the concept, but had so much trouble with failures with them (I had and sent back 3 of them), that I got to know the tech support people pretty well.  I kept the last Fire HD I had since it semi-worked.  Finally, however, with much trepidation (and a $50 one day price drop) I purchased the new Kindle Fire HDX.  It has proven perfect.  It has not crashed nor given me blank pages or any of the myriad problems I had with my Fire HDs.I had read of complaints with blue/purple borders on the HDX, but I did not see it with mine.  My wife said she saw a faint blue tinge at the edges, but it was not bothersome.  I use my HDX almost exclusively for reading and I prefer the black background with white printing so blue/purple borders are not an issue anyhow.I think if you have been disappointed with the first generation Fire HD you will be pleased with the HDX, at least as an E-reader.

Reviews.Title: i love it
Reviews.Author: Melissa Kay Krause
Reviews.Content: It is great. I have my books on hand without taking up room& plus it is my tablet much more compact than my laptop& lighter to carry. It fits easily in my purse. It was the perfect t gift. My husband did great in picking it out.

Reviews.Title: AMAZING
Reviews.Author: EPIC minecraft lover
Reviews.Content: This is THE most epic gift you could give someone! In fact, I'm even typing this review on it now!!!!! Very pleased. :@)

Reviews.Title: overall great, with some features being missed
Reviews.Author: Analyzerlx
Reviews.Content: The tablet is great at what it is intended to do. I can read books and surf the net with ease. I have found some nice games to play, the little issues I see are just annoyances. If the tablet had a rear-facing camera  I would be a little happier. It just heightens the value aspect. I also would have loved to have able a quick charger standard instead of having to pay!  The standard charger takes hours to charge while using it. Overall I am happy with the quality hardware and available apps.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: grubb
Reviews.Content: Perfect size for reading, traveling, entertainment!  Graphics outstanding and the weight is perfect!  I bought two for my house and highly recommend!

Reviews.Title: love it!
Reviews.Author: Maggie Hall
Reviews.Content: I had an original Kindle and just got the Fire HDX over Christmas and couldn't be happier with it! It has everything.g I need and is so easy to travel with. I highly recommend!!

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Tyler Kunce
Reviews.Content: I love this tablet.  It is more than capable of handling everything I need of it.  It takes a bit of time to get used to it; but, once you do, it's capable of everything you would ask of an iPad or Surface, in my opinion.  I'm not a huge fan of the advertisements on the lock/security screen, but It's not a huge drawback.

Reviews.Title: Battery life and charging time not really as advertised.
Reviews.Author: Philippe J. Leroy
Reviews.Content: I seem to be having problems extending the useful battery life beyond 6 hours. Also the recharging time seems to be much longer than on my old 1st generation kindle.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 7"
Reviews.Author: Courtney Champy
Reviews.Content: I like the brightness and quality of the display. The speed is pretty good and it is easy to navigate.A very big turn-off is the lack of customization, I like my own backgrounds and now when I am not at home reading I cannot look at my dog which is relaxing and makes reading more enjoyable. Unfortunately the next model may have this but an upgrade that enables this would be phenomenal, as it is an expensive purchase and I cannot investing in the newest version for one change.

Reviews.Title: love my kindle fire
Reviews.Author: staci pullinger
Reviews.Content: Very easy to use! Fast downloads for apps. I would rate it 5 stars.  The clarity and HD are fantastic.

Reviews.Title: A great gitf from the kids for Christmas
Reviews.Author: Susan oleneack
Reviews.Content: I chose four stars because I wish I had asked for the larger version. 7" is just a little too small. Otherwise, I am very pleased with this Kindle version and appreciate the special offers and the mayday button. Great for this baby boomer Mom who isn't as tech savvy as the kids.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: katt 3woman
Reviews.Content: Love the games and books but still have trouble writing messages.  Good size and weight.  I think it's a good tool for all ages.  My 11 year old granddaughter has one and she likes hers too.

Reviews.Title: My Comment
Reviews.Author: Roger Turner, L.
Reviews.Content: First, I am a new user of the HDX - I expect, after I become more knowledgeable about the device, my rating will improve. One of the first things I tried to do was download the User Guide - so far, I have been unsuccessful - it has simply taken too long and it times-out. It seems reasonable that there should be an easier (faster) way.  While I am computer "literate", it has been slow finding my way around all that the HDX offers.One of the reasons I selected the HDX was the availability of the Skype App.  When I installed it, however, Skype advised that they were blocking my account - because of a break-in that occurred in 2010. Everything was resolved by Skype and my bank, and I have been using Skype on my desktop ever since.  Working with Skype to unblock my account was endlessly frustrating.A minor point. I have used Every Word: Crossing on a previous Kindle.  I expected to use it on the HDX. However, after searching the Kindle website, I finally determined it was not compatible with the HDX. Subsequently, I purchase (it was free) the App Every Word - and received confirmation.  However, it was never delivered.  Your helpful tech determined that (again) it was not compatible with the HDX.  Not a crises - just a bit irritating.I have not yet used the Amazon Assist feature yet - but I think the offering is excellent.In one of the reviews I read before selecting the HDX, the reviewer commented that the On/Off button was in an awkward place - I agree.Thank you for the opportunity to comment.

Reviews.Title: Mayday
Reviews.Author: murray johnson
Reviews.Content: Just wanted to give a little praise to the Mayday people. Called them at 0430 hrs, CST , on 28 Jan. They came on line quickly, were very polite and knew exactly what to do about my problem. I only wish I could remember the young lady's name that was so helpful. I was back up and running within 5 minutes. Excellent job people. I have the technical abilities of a toad and she patiently stayed with  me until I got. By the way I own 3 of the Fire, 2 of the HDX's. Thanks for the help.

Reviews.Title: Love it!!!
Reviews.Author: svetlana
Reviews.Content: Got a Kindle Fire HDX 7 for Christmas!!!! great for watching videos doesn't buffer or blur!!!! also the mayday is very helpful

Reviews.Title: Awesome!
Reviews.Author: Donna L Wood
Reviews.Content: This was the best purchase I have made. My Kindle Fire HDX has proven to be the best tablet I have own. It's far better than the iPad. All of the apps that I need for my work were easily downloaded for a reasonable price. Thank you!

Reviews.Title: Battery life
Reviews.Author: KIRBY GILMORE
Reviews.Content: Don't go on a trip and expect the Kindle to last any more than 30 minutes before a recharge. Other than that it is a great devise and handy to use.

Reviews.Title: love it!
Reviews.Author: Sherrie Thurman
Reviews.Content: I bought a nook tablet 2 years ago...it was fine to read books but not to actually use as a tablet. This fire HDX is what I wanted. Great e reader! Super easy now to download books from my local library...and actually works like a tablet! Facebook/email/internet/games...all work fabulous ...I read some complain about the "blue line" around the edges of a book. I "see" it from time to time but it truly does not affect my reading experience. This is a great buy ...tons of free or deeply discounted books and other contact available thru Amazon. Love my kindle HDX!:)

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I have the first Kindle Fire and love it so when they came out with the HD version I considered updating but didn't. When the HDX became available and they offered 20% off for one day, I had to take advantage of it. I am truly glad I did because I am very satisfied with my purchase and would highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: christmas gift
Reviews.Author: Wanda Joyner
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my grandson.  He is thrilled to have it and is looking forward to all it's uses and benefits.

Reviews.Title: OMG I LOVE MY KINDLE
Reviews.Author: Lyn of Detroit
Reviews.Content: Love this kindle, this is my first one and it's amazing. The mayday button is great, the people are so helpful and friendly.The color and clarity of the screen is beautiful, I can sit in the dark and read a book with no problem. The size is just right, small enough too carry anywhere you go but large enough to see with ease. Fantastic product!

Reviews.Title: Clearly Like It
Reviews.Author: Ron Hill
Reviews.Content: My KindleFire HDX is clear, colors are bright and sharp. I'm having a lot of fun with it! One minor hick, the screen flickers at times but that's no biggy.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire
Reviews.Author: val7777
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my 14 year old grandson, and when his friends saw it they laughed at him and told him it was gay.  Then they checked it out for themselves and fell in love with it.  They all asked their parents for one too!  It is a wonderful gadget!

Reviews.Title: YAAAAAAAY
Reviews.Author: Stephanie Vold
Reviews.Content: I LOVE THIS THING. LOVE IT. Great selection of apps, great resolution, and very user friendly. If only it supported Flash...

Reviews.Title: Superb
Reviews.Author: H. S. Miller "insatiable reader"
Reviews.Content: I have gotten every 7" Fire as it came out.  All have been a pleasurable experience, but this HDX has exceeded all my expectations by far!  I was reluctant to get it as I only expected a software update and a few added gizmos.  I had hoped they would include another camera on it too, but no.What pushed me over the edge in purchasing it was a $50 coupon sent to me as a Prime customer, plus the knowledge I could sell my older HD Fire and recoup even more of the purchase price so it seemed to be worth a major software upgrade, all by itself.WOW!  Holy computational power, Batman!!!  I am more than delighted with this 7" HDX!  The total difference between the older Fire HD generation one and this Fire HDX is amazing!  Incredible value here!  My only regret is that it doesn't support Flash, but neither did the HD unless you sideloaded Dolphin, and for the most part I can do without having Flash on it.  I do hope a software upgrade will enable Flash videos on it, and soon, but with the outstanding performance and speed of the HDX as it is, I can live without having Flash.  Besides, what a lot of people don't realize is, if you use any other OS (in order to view Flash) rather than the Amazon version, you lose all the great benefits of Amazon's cloud loading and storage, which is part of the reason for it's speed and super flexibility.This HDX is a true world-beater.  I can't imagine what even newer models could provide in addition except another camera on the 7" model.  I have not used the Mayday help feature, but since I've used Fires from the very beginning I'm used to handling the OS.  I can see where the Mayday help feature could be absolutely invaluable to a beginning purchaser, though.  You get help on the spot and instantly.

Reviews.Title: Great Device - Compact & Fast
Reviews.Author: Harry C Mounts
Reviews.Content: I was looking for something small and compact, yet powerful enough to download and stream fast. I found it in the Kindle Fire HDX. This is such a versatile computer, I find myself NOT using my smartphone or laptop pc. Picture quality is great, fast downloads, fast streaming, plenty of apps to choose, and it's a great device to read those novels you've been wanting to download. I've had the Kindle for six weeks now and use it daily - not one problem. Very satisfied customer!

Reviews.Title: Best touch device I have experienced
Reviews.Author: Latisha Phillips
Reviews.Content: Was looking for a computer/laptop to mostly browse the internet/watch youtube videos, social sites..etc that I could carry around with me conveniently.  I didnt want to pay over 300 for this and was also looking for something current. My bro has the 8.9 HD version and after playing on his one day I was hooked..I was going to get one but I came across the HDX fire version, plus Amazon offered it to me where I can pay it in installments!!! I was sold! Smaller but it's so FAST and visibility is AMAZING (I didnt see a problem with the HD fire when playing with it.) Battery life is AMAZING..It charges fully after about an hour at the latest and stays for at least 2 to 3 days with my playing on it moderately. I have only WIFI connection so I can only use at my apt and where wifi is avail. Only gripe is I wish that they had the google play store to choose my apps from since I use on my phone.  Other than that, I love my KINDLE!! Best purchase yet.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 7"
Reviews.Author: Silent American
Reviews.Content: Kindle Fire HDX 7" has met all my expectations as far as its display and how easy it is to use it.

Reviews.Title: Traveling to New Zealland soon.Anxious to see how my Kindle Fire works.
Reviews.Author: Sheila A. Friedli dba Friedli Inc
Reviews.Content: I like it.  I need too take the time and contact Amazon and get a complete lesson on how to use it however.  I have to get an adapter for electrical in New Zealand.  It does not seem to be a problem tho,

Reviews.Title: LOVE MY KINDLE FIRE!!
Reviews.Author: Paula S Gilmore
Reviews.Content: I loved to read on my first generation Kindle and thought for a long time that I wouldn't want it for anything but to read.  BOY WAS I WRONG!  Got tempted over the holidays and got one.  Now I read, listen to music, check my email, play games, check the weather and news, use exercise apps, track my weight, exercise and what i eat, and do my grocery list on a notepad app.  WOW!. i like this size because it fits easily into my purse.

Reviews.Title: Christmas Gift for my 85-yr old Mother.  She LOVES it.  Absolutely LOVES it.
Reviews.Author: Bad Dog
Reviews.Content: Seriously. She has taken to it like a fish to water.  Loves using it for her emails and web surfing.  And completely loves watching movies and old Masterpiece Theater series on it.  The brutal weather in the Midwest this winter has kept her housebound more than usual and arthritis has left her less mobile than usual, so this has been a completely fabulous Christmas present for her.
