She sits at the dining table in the morning to have her coffee and checks email, reads newspapers on line, etc.  Then in the evenings she's watching movies in bed.  She's now only using her laptop when she needs to print something or if she needs to type a document that then needs to be printed.  For her interests & uses, it's great.

Reviews.Title: Great replacement for the Nook HD
Reviews.Author: David Schultz
Reviews.Content: It became very clear to me that Amazon would win out in the long run on the eReader front. I decided to get a Fire HDX 7" to replace my Nook HD, and am very happy that I did.  The integration with the Prime environment is great, the device is outstanding.  Very fast, and the screen is amazingly clear and bright.  Very good black levels also when watching video.

Reviews.Title: re: special offers
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "whodunit"
Reviews.Content: I did not know if I would like the special offers but have found that some are very useful. If you aren't interested it is easily skipped. I am glad I decided to try it!

Reviews.Title: Love It!
Reviews.Author: mrscentric
Reviews.Content: I love my new 7" Kindle Fire HDX!  Very user friendly.  Perfect for what I need to do - read, web and social media.

Reviews.Title: Works SOOO much better than previous generations!
Reviews.Author: Rikki
Reviews.Content: Got this recently, and where my last Kindle Fire had trouble on the internet (slow) this one does not. Super quick, great display.

Reviews.Title: BEST TABLET EVER!!!!
Reviews.Author: Christine J Nixon
Reviews.Content: It is the best tablet ever!!!  My Nook tablet does not come close to my Kindle fire HDX. Just the right size too.  Easy to take with me where ever I go.

Reviews.Title: I wanted to love this.
Reviews.Author: Leysa "leysam"
Reviews.Content: Really, I did.  I wanted to love this.  I originally wanted an iPad mini, and decided to give this a try since it was half the price.  The screen was very nice, I'll give it that.  The app selection is severely lacking.  The Silk browser....well, the less said about that, the better.But the dealbreaker came when I had it for 2 weeks, and the screen started flickering severely anytime I did anything that wasn't checking mail/surfing the web/reading a book.  Want to play a game?  Watch Netflix?  Constant flickering.  Amazon quickly sent me a replacement unit....which looked like someone had sneezed a smattering of dead pixels on the bottom right corner straight out of the box.  I am returning both units and purchasing an iPad mini.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 7"
Reviews.Author: babsoflansdale
Reviews.Content: I really love my Kindle.  This is my second one and I almost didn't get it because the other one had a problem charging.  This one is set us a little differently in the charging area and it seems to fit tighter.  Hopefully it will continue to charge without any problems.  I also think it would be nice if you could take pictures of others, not just selfies.  The quality of the pictures and scenes are great.  I love to see nature shots or movies on it as they are almost like you are there.  Sound quality is also great.  I would recommend this Kindle to anyone.  It's really a lot of fun and you can do whatever you want.  It's like carrying your computer with you.

Reviews.Title: everything at your finger tips!
Reviews.Author: BSharbuno
Reviews.Content: Have been looking for a long time to replace kindle touch and get one that did more than just supply reading material.I'm a prime member and stream tv shows and movies. Love the portability of the kindle.  Everything I like to do is in one place.

Reviews.Title: Love my Kindle!
Reviews.Author: Sandy
Reviews.Content: The Kindle I purchased is awesome. It's more that I ever imagined. It's cheaper than an Ipad and does just as much.

Reviews.Title: Freetime is great!
Reviews.Author: SM "SM"
Reviews.Content: I bought two of these for my 5 and 7 year old kids. They are REALLY loving it, and I am loving that I can completely control what they have access to with the fantastic Freetime app. So far I have not used it to allocate time limits (but I have threatened to turn it on if they complain when told it's time to put it down, which they of course did the first couple of times).Useful tip: Since I have two of these, it's easier to use Amazon on the web to purchase items, then go to the digital library and you can manage your freetime profiles right from there, so I can allow the kids access to apps, books and movies without entering my password multiple times on the Kindles. The items magically appear on the Kindles in just a few seconds. I love hearing the kids say 'Hey I got a new game/book/movie' before I'm even done using the computer!

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 7"
Reviews.Author: JoyS
Reviews.Content: Purchased as a gift and update for my husband, he loves it, and so do I.  I recommend that if you can afford to skip the advertising, you do so.  For the first time, I left the ads on the system, and that adds a step onto your journey to get past the ads.  I LOVE the live help feature!  Way to go Amazon!

Reviews.Title: Awesome Gadget!!
Reviews.Author: Jovan Alejandro "JA-hermit"
Reviews.Content: This gadget is great I can bring all the books I love, surf the internet, download apps, play games and listen to music all in one device to take with me anywhere! I definitly recommend this gadget to anyone that loves to read! The gadget is easy to use plus there's always help for those who never use the device before. Worth every penny and good to give as a Christmas or Birthday gift.

Reviews.Title: Love my Kindle
Reviews.Author: K.T.
Reviews.Content: I love my Kindle and use it often! My only complaint is, I wish it had an outward facing camera. I'm not big on "selfies" but that's pretty much all this camera can do.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Screen quality and responsiveness.
Reviews.Author: Matt Bolton
Reviews.Content: I've owned a few tablets, the speed and responsiveness on this tablet are great in comparison.  The screen is brilliant and vivid. We bought this for our 10 year old who will not put it down unless we make him of course.I would like to see the Google Play store on in the future as I do have a library of bought games and utils that I could utilize; however the Amazon App store has a very large library as well so this would only be a nicety.The battery life last nearly all day of using it for youtube.com or games. Another tablet we have goes only about 5 hours in comparison.It passes the "I would buy another one" test.

Reviews.Title: love my Kindle
Reviews.Author: sheedle
Reviews.Content: this is my third Kindle and by far the best I love it love it, would recommend for reading, surfing and playing games

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 7 is the best Christmas Gife I ever received
Reviews.Author: Tom Persinger
Reviews.Content: I love the Kindle Fire HDX 7. The graphics are wonderful, the book option of reading the book my self or having an audio book is great. The only issue I have with it is will lock up on occasion when playing a game from the app store.

Reviews.Title: Totally happy with my Kindle Fire!
Reviews.Author: annieoma
Reviews.Content: I have just been blown away with how well things started out & still seem to be going!  I am so happy that I bought my Kindle Fire.  I think my husband is a bit jealous because he bought a different name brand tablet that isn't operating as well as my Kindle!  There is just so much I can do that I never dreamed I could.  Thank you Amazon for the wonderful customer service too!  I would recommend this purchase to anyone who is looking at various tablets.  Please look seriously at the Kindle before you decide on another kind of tablet.

Reviews.Title: KINDLE Fire HDX
Reviews.Author: shell
Reviews.Content: I love this kindle fire, it is so easy to use and the screen is a great size. The fire is fast and the screen is bright so I can read easily. I didn't have trouble when I first started using it and I would recommend this to a friend.

Reviews.Title: Great all around tablet
Reviews.Author: nicholas
Reviews.Content: Love it!! first tablet easy to use easy to download apps n has a great section to pick from from kids games to business apps

Reviews.Title: Best Kindle
Reviews.Author: Betty J Wood
Reviews.Content: Love , Love, Love it.  Light and easy to hold and read. It totally met my expectations a must have.

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: d
Reviews.Content: I bought two. One had the difficulty mentioned in other reviews - turning off often. MY husband contacted Amazon & they talked him through a fix. No more problems!

Reviews.Title: Kindle HDX delivers
Reviews.Author: Shawn M. Miller
Reviews.Content: I have the Kindle HDX, HD and Paperwhite.  They are all awesome.  If I could only buy one, I would buy the HDX, for the reason of versatility and the price difference between the HD and HDX with 16GB is only $60.  For $60, you get a faster processor, faster downloads, better screen and other enhancements.  If you are only going to use it for reading novels, then the Paperwhite is the way to go.  Very easy to use - if you use Amazon Prime this is the way to go.  If you don't, then only the Google Nexus and ipad compare with this device; I would look at those two before deciding to purchase.

Reviews.Author: Just W
Reviews.Content: Second best packaging behind the Google Chromecast.The changes in the HDX vs the HD are very practical. From button placement to OS layout.Kindle's major flaw is software. Obviously Amazon & Google are competing in the device market. But as a Kindle owner, you lose out on access to Google apps. This is huge. The Kindle apps tend to be two or three versions behind their Google Play counterparts. The selection in the Amazon App Store is also much slimmer. Not getting some key apps from Google, Microsoft and other major developers. So if you are a power user, you might want to go with any other Android device.The screen resolution is really nice. Sharp and bright graphics. I've noticed an occasional brightness flicker. But nothing too terrible. Video playback is quick and clean. Easy to watch a whole movie on this.Really great speakers. Too bad there was no space for them on the front. The way that tablets are designed, no manufacturer really want's to take away screen space for speakers.Three things I want to see in the next version are:A return of the micro HDMI port. Who knows. I might use it one day.Upgrade-able memory.Replaceable battery.

Reviews.Title: my kids loved it...
Reviews.Author: Diana  Melissa
Reviews.Content: Very happy!!!! It was a Christmas presents for my kids and they love it I recommend not only for the games now they are reading more books

Reviews.Title: It would have been 5 stars except...
Reviews.Author: Douglas Dickerson "codougd"
Reviews.Content: ... for the annoying carousel and the fact that there is no way to disable it.Overall, the Kindle HDX is exactly as I expected and fits my needs, as planned and anticipated.The Kindle is NOT a "general purpose" tablet replacement or competitor. Its strengths are aimed squarely at us members of the Amazon ecosystem.It is a very good ereader. The color screen is crisp and, as a color screen, is more suitable for technical volumes than the B&W; Kindles. The is some glare in bright light but that is the trade-off for color.The included apps are good enough. I appreciate being able to jump to a browser to research something I encounter in book I am reading. The Silk browser is much improved over previous instances. The mail app is also good enough for casual use.I don't watch videos on the Kindle so I can't comment on the performance at that task. I have watched some video tutorials using the browser and that worked well.In all, if you accept that the Kindle is a media consumption device with hooks into and dependencies upon the Amazon ecosystem and if that is why you bought it you will be very happy. If you buy it as a cheaper alternative to other Android-based tablets you will likely be disappointed.

Reviews.Title: How did I live without it?
Reviews.Author: S. Simons "MOM of  SGT TR"
Reviews.Content: After having a 'regular' kindle for 3 years, I decided to update (as a gift for myself) to a Fire HDX...WOW! ...such vivid pictures, and the ability to increase the print size with a touch of my finger is amazing!  I had over 400 books on my original, and they are there (in the cloud) or I can move them back and forth. I love having my Bible on my Fire, as well as several of my favorite cookbooks. I have even downloaded Craftsy classes and view those seamlessly as I sew right along! LOVE, LOVE, LOVE my new Kindle!!

Reviews.Title: Best Kindle Fire Hands Down
Reviews.Author: David Cripe
Reviews.Content: I bought this Kindle Fire HDX during the cyber-Monday special of $179, which was totally worth it as that price.  My family has owned the original Kindle Fire the past two years roughly, and this one is way above that version.  Is it better than the Kindle Fire HD version?  Depends, but probably not if price is your biggest factor.Pros:1) iPad Contender - Seriously.  The iPad in my opinion is way overpriced for what it does.  The Kindle Fire HDX is just as capable at handling most of the same work flow with a couple of differences.  Yes, this is tied to the Amazon App store.  If Google Play was standard, then Apple might be worried.  Right now though, Amazon is crippling their own success.2) Fluid Performance - Smooth as butter.  I have played around with everything available for the past two months and it handles it all with excellence.  Games, work, reading, etc run flawlessly (app issues not withstanding).3) Screen - Sharpest resolution I have ever seen on a screen this size.  Made the original Kindle Fire look like a 10 year old non-HD television.  I could stare at this thing for days (but won't).  Reading, movies, games, etc are shown in perfect HD resolution.NOTE - The blue pixel edge issue is there, but it is not distracting to me.  I actually kind of like it.  If you read a lot on white backgrounds, then it pops out more than normal.  The haze falls to the background after I begin reading the first page of something, and I never notice it much any more.4) Micro USB Connector - Bite it Apple!  :)  No cord carousal here.  If you have a cord sitting around, it most likely works for charging or connecting the Kindle Fire HDX.  For the first time ever - a plug adapter is included!  Amazon is including a plug adapter so you can actually charge the device through a regular electrical outlet.  What a concept Amazon!  That might catch on with other electronics (sarcasm).5) Bells and Whistles - This thing has it all (mostly).  Dual-band WiFi, HD screen, Amazon support (best in the world), light as a feather, etc, etc.Cons:1) Amazon App Store (sort of) - No Google Play?  I know Amazon wants everyone to use the device for their content, but not allowing one of the largest app stores on your Android device seems illogical.  I am able to use 3rd-party app stores to upload missing apps and outdated ones on the Amazon App Store, but still!2) USB Connection Port - The connection port on the device can be a bit of a nuisance.  You have to connect it at an angle on the device (around 30 degrees).  Just irritating to me for some reason as everything else has it straight, so your mileage may vary.3) Mayday Button Gimmick - I am a computer-savvy person.  I don't need help on where to press the power button or tweak the brightness.  If you are buying this for grandma or a person that never has used much technology in the past 10 years, then this is a life saver for you (no more annoying phone calls).4) Battery - I get a couple days of heavy usage (8 hours) out of it.  I just wish I could get the Kindle reader battery life of 4 to 8 weeks.  :)Overall:This is finally the Kindle to put Amazon in striking range of Apple on the tablet front.  If you crave everything Amazon like me, then it is a no brainer to purchase this.  If you are not, then buy it anyway as you will save at least $100 over the nearest priced iPad.  If Amazon would just switch to Google Play for the app store, then there is nothing that would stop them from ruling the world!  :)

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 7"
Reviews.Author: Melissa
Reviews.Content: New owned a Kindle or a Tablet and got this for Christmas and I love it! It's like a mini laptop to go! I highly recommend this to everyone, it's very user friendly and stays charged for quite a while.  And the possibilities are endless!! LOVE, LOVE, LOVE IT!!!!

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX7"
Reviews.Author: Sandra Lagerblade
Reviews.Content: Granddaughter is happy with the gift, so I am happy. The most amazing thing was I read a book on Kindle before it even reached the bookstores!

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX
Reviews.Author: Janis Ruid
Reviews.Content: I love it.  It does everything I need it to do to my satisfaction.  I find it user friendly and the clarity is superb.

Reviews.Title: Awesome device!
Reviews.Author: Melanee Moore
Reviews.Content: We purchased this for our son for Christmas he hasn't put it down since he opened it!  Great Buy!  He likes the battery life, the weight and size, and the portabillity.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire. This is the first for me nd i really like it! I haven't "searched" very much with it yet but I'm hoping that will b
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: This is the first for me. I really like it! I haven't "searched" very much with it yet but I'm hoping that will be easy too!

Reviews.Title: Its nice
Reviews.Author: Mahlon
Reviews.Content: Nice again to have an e-reader/tablet to read on instead of my smartphone.I also love the color screen for pdfs (much better than e-ink, or regular computer) for reading long pdf documents.Video is great, sound is as well, takes a long time to charge but usually even streaming over wifi and watching high def, I still get 2-3 hours out of a full charge with sound max.Also able to throttle it back decently if you turn off the wifi and brightness etc when not in use, works decently, but also don't expect a quick charge even with a high power charger hehe, I try and charge for no shorter than an hour for quick top offs, and 2-3+ hours if its more than 20% I need.All in all great device.

Reviews.Title: kindle fire HDX 7 tablet
Reviews.Author: William Lopez
Reviews.Content: I also have the kindle fire HD 7 2012 model and I love it.  Now Amazon has improved it with the new HDX and I love it even more. If people were more informed that the kindle tablets are not just for reading books but they can do what any android tablet can do Amazon would sell a lot more tablets.

Reviews.Title: Great tablet
Reviews.Author: mlo
Reviews.Content: I was gifted a Kindle Fire HD for Christmas 2012 and loved it. I checked out the new Kindle Fire HDX and thought to myself I have to upgrade. I normally don't purchase every upgrade of anything electronic, but since I heard the HDX was lighter and you could mirror your pad to you TV...I was sold. The HDX is lighter, faster and slicker with the same quality associated with the Kindle. I do not for one moment regret my purchase.

Reviews.Title: So good, except....
Reviews.Author: Linda Berry "technogeek"
Reviews.Content: This is so good in so many ways = speed is excellent, great for streaming videos (part of the reason I chose the Kindle over a Nexus 7 is the ability to stream Amazon instant videos) size is perfect for ebooks but not too small to work for videos, battery life is great. The only rub is the limited apps due to not being able to access anything but Amazon app store. Add Google Play access and I would give it 5 stars. I was ready to change from Kobo to Kindle for a variety of reasons but was hoping I could have accessed my already purchased Kobo books with an app on my Kindle. Should have done my homework better, my bad. Very disappointing, but really the only complaint I have with this handy little tablet.

Reviews.Title: good overall
Reviews.Author: Anita Werner
Reviews.Content: Perfect size and weight for me.  Easy-to-use.  Only complaint is it doesn't connect to our Wi-Fi until you stand within  3 feet of the source, then you can move away.  All of our other devices pick up our Wi-Fi anywhere in our home.  Each time we turn on this Kindle we have to walk back to our Wi-Fi box for it find it.  Even our basic Kindle reader works better with our Wi-Fi than this newer Kindle Fire.

Reviews.Title: For Me Better than the Nexus 7 !!!
Reviews.Author: Osvaldo J
Reviews.Content: There are two types of tablets, the regular tablets no tied to a content service and the KINDLE, if a easy choice, you can spend time going around searching for things you would like to have and use or use a content tablet like the KINDLE's that already have done that for you and have it presentment in a well easy to find, read to use secure environment for you and your kids.I use to had a NEXUS 7 which is a great tablet, but the issue in my case is that the best GOOGLE service don't work in my country, just in the USA...and sadly GOOGLE take like for ever to resolve that issue. So I decided to move to this great content service AMAZON have that have more that you can ever imagine to have in the palm of your hand. I invite you to try it ...you like me wont be disappointed and best of all tools and services work excellent outside the US.

Reviews.Title: All I can say is wow!
Reviews.Author: Carolyn A. Layne "knitting addict"
Reviews.Content: I previously owned an Android tablet which was a dismal product.  So far I love the Kindle fire HDX 7".  I had to use the Mayday button once when I was first setting it up and was thrilled at how helpful and easy it makes using the HDX.  I guess I am old fashioned in that I prefer to speak to a human being!  And you can actually see who you are talking to.  It makes it a great personal touch.  Thanks Amazon for coming up with this concept.  I am looking forward to using this tablet extensively.  I highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Love it! Love it! Love it!
Reviews.Author: Noreen
Reviews.Content: Easy to set up, movies and videos are great to watch. I have had enjoyed the whole kindle experience. Customer support has been fantastic too.Thank you for exceeding my expectations!Noreen Otten

Reviews.Title: exceeded expectations!
Reviews.Author: Ginny
Reviews.Content: This item was for a gift and totally exceeded the person's ( Giftee) expectations! Loves it!!!!!!  5 stars  plusssss! would highly recommend!

Reviews.Title: Not regreting my purchase so far ;)
Reviews.Author: Laura Geiersbach
Reviews.Content: I am loving this tablet. I've used android tablets in the past and I feel the Kindle fits my usage needs better. The lack of Google apps is not an issue for me. It hasn't frozen on me as others stated but if it does I'm sure it's an easy fix. Most tablets do that from time to time. There is definitely a blue haze on the outer screen when on a white screen but it doesn't take away from anything in my opinion. This is my first kindle and I think it's the beginning of a long term relationship. I will update if that changes but so far, so good.

Reviews.Title: Glad we purchased hdx!
Reviews.Author: Lauren R. Adams
Reviews.Content: Amazing picture & impressive sound quality! Quite an upgrade from the bulky 1st generation fire! Faster operating system. Power & volume controls are ergonomicly placed on the back.Heads up: keep the latter in mind when selecting a case!-thought I could use the same case I purchased for my son's 1st gen kindle fire. http://www.amazon.com/gp/aw/d/B008PWUQPYAlthough it fits nicely in the case, you find that you must untuck a corner in order to effectively access the power & volume buttons on the back, as well as the  power port & ear phones plug in on the sides.Great Product!

Reviews.Title: Awesome!
Reviews.Author: srv112779
Reviews.Content: Love my kindle it is super awesome and I would recommend to everyone! Everyone should get one, it is great!

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: Kimberlee S. Fisher "Happy in Texas"
Reviews.Content: Great reader, with lots more functions to use.picture and colors are awesome. It is also so much lighter to hold.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX
Reviews.Author: Paulette Freese
Reviews.Content: This is my first tablet, and overall I like it.  I have Amazon Prime, and purchased the Kindle with the intent to down load movies.  So far, I haven't gotten around to doing that.  It came with instructions as to how to connect to WiFi, so I got that going the first night.  I like the cloud sharing of books and photos from my phone.  Setting it up was not intuitive and I had to use the help key.  The help was fantastic, and got me set up with my books from the Kindle on my phone right away.  I chose the 4GLTE option so I could use it in areas where there is no WiFi.  I have not been able to figure out how to access the 4GLTE option.  I've downloaded several sets of instructions, but so far, no luck.  I may need to break down and call the help line again.  I'm sure that there are many more things I can do with it besides read books, but need to take the time to work with it.

Reviews.Title: Awesome screen
Reviews.Author: Patricia Hemphill
Reviews.Content: Just love my Kindle.  The graphics are incredible!  I only wish that I could have a choice of something other than white or black as a background for the eBooks.  I'd prefer a cream color (the stark white is a bit too bright for me) with dark black text.  There is an option for cream background but it has a gray text and that's not enough contrast.  Otherwise I have no complaints at all.

Reviews.Title: Good Product, Missing Key Features
Reviews.Author: Tim Stasko
Reviews.Content: I did not really obtain any special offers that are useful. I only have two real complaints thought. The fact that this Kindle come with absolutely no outside camera and does not have access to the Google play store are huge flaws. I bought the unit over the nook because it stated that the unit had a camera, but did not specify that it was only and front facing camera. Other than those issue the unit is great!

Reviews.Title: Great Screen
Reviews.Author: karatemom23
Reviews.Content: The colors and clarity of the screen are wonderful. Much nicer than my husbands tablet. Got the smaller one and am still happy with it

Reviews.Title: The Kindle Fire HDX 7" is great!
Reviews.Author: Karen M Boudreau
Reviews.Content: I am enjoying my Kindle Fire that I received as a Christmas gift. It's very easy to use, and I like being able to read books and the Bible on it. I like having the option to use different apps on it, and being able to do most everything online (checking email, using bank apps, Facebook, etc) without having to use a computer! I have downloaded a few games, and the quality of the graphics and the sound are excellent! I also bought this Kindle because of the camera feature - I'm going to be using Skype quite often to talk to friends and relatives out of state! I guess the only downfall is that if you don't have Wi-Fi available you can't use some of the features of the Kindle. But overall I would recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: The kindle hdx 7"
Reviews.Author: grayboy
Reviews.Content: The sound video and color were very good.But the battery life was not that great when watching a movie.But overall  I would buy it again

Reviews.Title: Pretty cool but...
Reviews.Author: Joseph Myerson
Reviews.Content: It is REALLY hard to quit apps. It has plenrty of memory to keep everything you've ever opened up and running, but dang what A pain to quit. It is kind of counter intuitive if one is familiar with iPads and Galaxy devices to buy apps. Also it is a bit of a challenge to navigate. That being said, it is sleek, stylish, has great battery life and a decently ranged wifi antenna. All in all, a solid 4. I feel it was money well spent.

Reviews.Title: GREAT PRODUCT
Reviews.Author: Nspyr
Reviews.Content: This is awesome and very light. I have a Note 10.1 but I bought a kindle for my wife. It is smaller and lighter than I expected. Not small where it would be uncomfortable to read from, but compact. the screen is clear. The only thing I didn't like was that it took several weeks to arrive. Other than that, all is well.

Reviews.Title: no problems with this one
Reviews.Author: R. P. Lewis
Reviews.Content: We own four Kindles and they all perform flawlessly. I love my older Fire for reading, browsing the web and for watching TV via the Sling Adapter. This newer unit was a gift for my son and has even more features than my older one -- including actual volume buttons (which mine lacks). The Kindle is a terrific device for the price -- and we've not encountered any of the problems mentioned in other reviews.

Reviews.Title: Great Gift
Reviews.Author: Betty D Bell
Reviews.Content: this kindle was a Christmas gift to my daughter and she absolutely loves it.  she does however have a problem with the camera part, apparently you can only take pictures that are facing the front of the kindle. this is not good because it does not seem you can take a picture of something you are looking at.

Reviews.Title: Good product
Reviews.Author: customer
Reviews.Content: So far so good.  Mayday works great.  Great video quality and fast processor.  Downloadable Amazon Prime a plus for me

Reviews.Title: if it were 4G it would be perfect.
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: almost bought a surface, this is so much better.Like it better than my nexus7 and an Ipad.This is the bomb

Reviews.Title: love it, would recommed to anyone.
Reviews.Author: Katricia Scantlebury
Reviews.Content: Would buy another one, were a kindle family this is our fourth kindle in the house. Amazon needs to send me a bonus for shopping.

Reviews.Title: Good but not as I expected
Reviews.Author: Margaret U.
Reviews.Content: I have the original Kindle with just the e-reading ability. So I was excited to purchase the Fire HDX. I've used the email and some of the apps. such as a few games, netflix and download some music. I think the Battery length is very poor. I am disappointed that I must charge it every 6 hours of use, I expected a longer time. I would probably recommend to friends but with the caveat of short battery time.

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: dorothy
Reviews.Content: This is my second kindle fire, I am on both of them daily, Love them!  I am on Facebook daily & play games.

Reviews.Title: I love it
Reviews.Author: Michael R Jensen
Reviews.Content: I love it. it has a lot of things i can do i enjoy being able to read books and everything else

Reviews.Title: Kindle fire HD review
Reviews.Author: Elaine Glen
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a Christmas gift for my 14 year old granddaughter and she was thrilled when she opened it! She loves everything about it but, most of all, she loves that she is able to watch her favorite shows anytime she chooses anywhere she happens to be.

Reviews.Title: The Kindle Fire HDX is awesome!
Reviews.Author: Brenda F. Lewis
Reviews.Content: Love my Kindle Fire HDX! It is my second Kindle Fire and just don't want to be without one. Easy to use.

Reviews.Title: Good decision to buy!
Reviews.Author: irishjdf
Reviews.Content: The perfect choice for a 7" tablet. Remember most Android tablets don't have access to the Amazon Instant Store. Its fast, has very sharp vivid screen and images, and has all the apps you need. Youtube can indeed be run through the browser.

Reviews.Title: I'm SUPER-thrilled with this thing!
Reviews.Author: Shirley A. Burton "Oddball Extreme"
Reviews.Content: I upgraded from my old Kindle Fire to the HDX and am seriously GLAD I did! This was exactly what I needed, particularly for the e-book I downloaded to watch video segments on cooking. The picture is so clear, and I have had no problems with it so far. I'm very happy with what I've got and will definitely recommend it to others. It's worth the money!

Reviews.Title: Weak battery
Reviews.Author: Charles Smith
Reviews.Content: For this Kindle to operate you tied to a power cord. It certainly is not portable. What could I be doing wrong? Or is this a weak battery source?

Reviews.Title: Incredibly satisfied with the HDX, two annoyances.
Reviews.Author: Wren Bouley
Reviews.Content: I am really satisfied with this product. I was worried whether I would get enough use out of the device to justify the cost (First tablet), but no longer.Pros:The shipping was quick and on time and the packaging was excellent.The device was received with a full charge on the battery. the charger appears to be of great quality.Camera/picture quality is great. I Skype a lot.The battery life is very good thus far. I can get about 12 hours of steady web use, 8 hours of constant streaming, and have left it idle for 3 days off charge and still had 99% battery life. I can take it to work for 14 hours with sporadic work related use and end the day with 30% battery life.The device functions smooth and quick. The processing speed is top notch.The display is so clear, HDX is great for viewing pleasure. No problems reading books in sunlight.The speakers are very clear and can get quite loud.Navigation is easy, not confusing at all.Amazon's free app of the day are usually high quality apps.Amazon also has these kindle customer only lightning deals that offer some serious value.Cons:The Device has, on 4 separate occasions, refused to respond from sleep mode. Just a black screen, like the device has been switched off, and it will not respond from pressing or holding the power button. All 4 times I got frustrated at the lack of response and walked away from it for a few hours. When I came back it worked just fine like there had never been a problem. Was not a charging issue, the battery had plenty of life left and I did not have it on charge while I let it be for a few hours.Amazon and the Google play store do not get along.  The kindle is designed to actively block any attempt to access the play store. It can be worked around of course, but it is annoying that I must do that. The Amazon app collection is not very large in comparison and leaves a lot to be desired to me.Overall it's great, I use it all the time. I want to give it 5 stars but for the two reasons listed above I have to deduct one star.

Reviews.Title: Clearly Audible
Reviews.Author: A2D1
Reviews.Content: A big challenge for other tablets in the market.Meets 95% of daily users needs.Great item to own for the price.

Reviews.Title: Love It
Reviews.Author: Kenny Schoborg
Reviews.Content: I got into reading about a year go and decided to invest in a Kindle after talking with several friends.  I waited cyber Mon. And they had another deal on the Fire HDX.  I decided to go with the newest version and am glad I did.  I really like the May day button on it and have used it several times. The people you get to help you are easy to get Long with and very helpful.  My original intention for getting one was just for reading.  Two days after I got my Kindle the hard drive in my laptop went to toast.  It took a couple of days and a couple of times on the May day site to get it set up for my WiFi so I could stay up to date on my e-mail.  That has been a life saver there as it's been over 2 weeks I've been using the Kindle for my e-mail.  Being in my 60's the only thing I'll say I don't like is the small key board for typing out an e-mail.  It' like the young people texting and I don't care for that.  Oh well, it could be worse and that's only a minor issue.  Luckily, I work across from a younger lady that seems to know a lot about this and has helped out a lot in learning how to get the most out of my Kindle.  If you're thinking about getting one, don't hesitate, you won't be sorry.

Reviews.Title: this is my second Kindle...loved my Fire but the Fire HDX REALLY ROCKS!!!
Reviews.Author: Jalayne Weinfurtner
Reviews.Content: love love love the ability to sort my books into catagories..I had over 1,000 books on orig...wish ttere was easy way to trfr all of them to new Kindle so I can read all on both

Reviews.Title: Great tablet
Reviews.Author: kayla
Reviews.Content: Good tablet to surf the web just wish it had a larger choices of apps like the Ipad does. Otherwise I have no real complaints about it, I use it everyday and love it!

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: H. M. Hicks
Reviews.Content: I bought this Kindle to replace my Kindle Fire.  I loved the Fire but this new Kindle has some interesting new features.  I like the option of having the Kindle read to me.  I can also choose different voices .  However I wish  Explore by touch could be separated from the screen reader.  The display is much clearer than my old Kindle and steaming is much more stable.  Text seems to  me sharper and clearer.  It is well worth the price of upgrading.

Reviews.Title: Favorite Christmas present!
Reviews.Author: Laurie Crumley
Reviews.Content: Picture is great! User friendly. Love mayday. Great size. Ideal for videos and picture storage. Mirroring with my Samsung Smart TV is a blast. I have an iPad mini and I prefer Fire HDX...and it was much better priced.

Reviews.Title: 7" kindle fire hdx
Reviews.Author: P. Murph
Reviews.Content: I enjoy my new kindle hdx. This replaces my first generation. The size is perfect and the games are so real. Playing  the game "riptide ' is awesome, The water splashes on the screen & the ability to tilt the screen when making the curves.  I love it!!

Reviews.Title: lOVE THE SLIMNESS
Reviews.Author: joleo
Reviews.Content: I bought the second Kindle for my husband.  He loves it.  I like it better than mine because it is so slim.  He won't trade with me though.  He is learning to use it.  Takes him longer as he is not very computer literate.  Now we can both play the games.  We like the game Four Words especially.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 7"
Reviews.Author: JWoods "Judi"
Reviews.Content: This purchase was an upgrade for me from the Kindle Fire.  I am still getting acquainted with the features, but I would definitely recommend it to my friends and family.  The pictures are sharp and brilliant, especially when streaming a movie.  When I stream music from Pandora, I use an external speaker which makes it easier to adjust the sound.

Reviews.Title: Great Buy!!!
Reviews.Author: Ruby J. DeForest
Reviews.Content: I am pleasantly surprised by the capabilities of this tablet.  It has a great picture and sound quality for watching video.As a reader it has some very nice features such as combining audio books with Kindle books.Browsing the web it fast and easy.It's was easy to set up my eMail account connection.

Reviews.Title: it ok i guess
Reviews.Author: Vandermin
Reviews.Content: It did not taste the way i thought it would very crunchy and cut my mouth. I need four more words O nope now im done

Reviews.Title: love the move to kindle
Reviews.Author: JMG
Reviews.Content: So easy to use, access apps, get books from purchase or library loan.  I Was an iPad user prior. Prefer comfort of this weight and size. Not as many apps but the selections are not bad and figure given time more will be added. This unit will pay for itself by renting college textbooks from Amazon compared to buying hard book on campus plus loads lighter in backpack.

Reviews.Title: My husband is brilliant!
Reviews.Author: samantha
Reviews.Content: Best purchase my husband could have made for me (aside from my engagement ring)! He almost purchased the Nexus 7 but the HDX was $50 off during cyber Monday, so he took a chance. After a week of playing around on it when I wasn't looking, he was 100% positive he had made the right choice! There is nothing about this product I dislike! The screen is so brilliant and crisp, and the mayday feature is wicked cool! I would advise people to stop throwing there money away on iPads and enjoy a kindle fire HDX!

Reviews.Title: Review: Kindle Fire HDX
Reviews.Author: ldytubird
Reviews.Content: I love my Kindle Fire HDX. I can't hardly put it down. I carry it everywhere just in case I get an additional chance to read.

Reviews.Title: Best 2013 Self bought Christmas gift!
Reviews.Author: Erycka923
Reviews.Content: I absolutely LOVE my new Kindle!! It is light, the picture is CLEAR, and fits perfectly in my purse!! I've told everyone I know they need to buy one!!

Reviews.Title: Much Better Than My Previous Kindle
Reviews.Author: Kyle Young
Reviews.Content: Before I got this I had the Kindle Fire 1st Gen. I got this and have fallen in love with the improvements that have been done to the Kindle Fire. It is lighter than the original fire and works much better in my opinion. It fits the needs I require which are reading, movies, games, and browsing the web. I don't care for all the fancy technical stuff or connecting to TV at really, I'm happy as long as it does what I need it to do.

Reviews.Title: Great device but lacking output/apps for external devices (TV, Receiver)
Reviews.Author: someone
Reviews.Content: There are many reviews for this device, but not much information about how to output the device display content to external TV/monitor. So, I'll share my experience with that part in case it could be useful for someone else looking for that functioanlity.I had this for few weeks, and basically can echo many other reviewers. Excellent build quality, display, Amazon apps. If you're planning to use this device just to shop, read, watch videos on Amazon (on Kindle display) I doubt you could find anything else even close. However, if you want to output the display or sound content to an external device like a TV it all starts to go downhill. I want to highlight these issues since I could not find any details on the web (except very few).For some reason, Amazon does not provide apps such as "Pioneer Control App" and "Panasonic Remote 2". These are essential for me to control my TV and receiver from Kindle, so I could use them as a workaround for at least playing my own music/video library. To make matters worse, there's no other display output (like DLNA, through the home network). Kindle does not have an HDMI port, and the USB port does not work as a "Slim Port". So, I tried the "Kindle Certified" NetgearPush2TV. A real dissapointing experience. I wrote a separate review for that. Apparently Amazon tech support (and Netgear support) does not know much about this (I spoke with at least 4 agenrts, if I remember correctly). All Amazon agents were great, but couldn't help. So, if you plan to use the Kindle for the following then you'll be dissapointed:1. Play music from Kindle to your networked (aka connected) receiver2. Play videos (from internet/Amazon Instant Videos and from your own library) from Kindle to a networked TV3. GPS (e.g. with CoPilot) --- Kindle does not have a GPS, which I realized after buying. My bad, not whining hereA modern high-end device like Kindle should provide this sort of basic functionality, in my opinion. I was surprised to learn these limitations (the hard way). There are apps for this sort of thing (e.g. Flips/iMediaShare) but they're far from perfection with many limitations. I tried very hard to keep the Kindle and find workarounds for the limitations mentioned above but I could not. So I had to return it.Since then I bought a Nexus 7. Only problem I have is that Amazon does not allow it to access Instant videos (I knew this before I bought it but still weird, because I can use any other device and don't see how Amazon makes money by blocking it. Kindle is really cheap, so, also hard to understand how they make lot of money by selling the hardware. So, I'm confused but there must be some reason other than just Amazon/Google rivarly). I don't watch videos very often (but my son takes care of that for me with his Kindle) so it's not a huge isue for me at this point.Again, you need to read this review very carefully since I did not attempt to highlight lot of good aspects of the device since others have already mentioned those; if the extra networking/navigation/output functionality is not needed for you then the Kindle is an excellent device.

Reviews.Title: Lovely little tablet. Really enjoying it.
Reviews.Author: Christine Hill
Reviews.Content: This is the first tablet I've ever owned so I can't really compare it to anything else out there on the market but I am enjoying my Kindle a lot. There is no way I could afford a new iPad and after using this, I don't think I would want one anyway. I use this primarily for reading, watching videos and movies, and occasionally surfing the web, so nothing terribly extensive. It suits my needs just fine, at a lower price point and makes me feel like getting an iPad would just be overkill for me. I purchased mine with the adds included and honestly it's not a big deal. They're not intrusive with whatever I might be doing on the tablet and if it bothered me that much I would just pay the $15 to have them removed. There are some deals that are exclusive to kindle fire owners which is pretty awesome and since I use amazon quite often for purchases, I don't mind a chance at snagging a good deal. There are plenty of apps to pick from (for my purposes anyway) like Facebook, Youtube, and a few games here or there. It's lightweight and easy to hold for reading while lounging around in bed and the movies I've watch show up in beautiful quality. I would definitely recommend a kindle tablet to anyone who is looking for a tablet for entertainment purposes but is hesitant to shell out the cash for one of the more expensive brands. Overall I am very happy with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: Excellent tablet
Reviews.Author: Shelley Courington
Reviews.Content: We ordered this for our daughter. Both my husband and I have only had ipads, so we were a little hesitant about the Kindle Fire. Well, there is no reason to be!  It is an excellent tablet for any age! We love the profile that we can set up, just for her. She has access to lots of books and games, as well as movies that are appropriate for her age. We don't have the ease of doing that with the iPad. She loves it and so do we!

Reviews.Title: Well worth it!
Reviews.Author: Marla Danis
Reviews.Content: Great tablet! Great value! We are an Apple family but for our 5 year old we read reviews and chose the HDX. It's perfect! Amazon coins have been a great value!

Reviews.Title: This review in not about the functionality of the kindle but the lack of information in the box
Reviews.Author: Dee "Damomo2"
Reviews.Content: I bought this, as a gift for my 72 year old mother. The first problem was that even though I marked it as a "gift" it was registered in my name. Her generation (mostly) is not tech savvy and we bought this model due to the mayday button. She lives 1000+ miles away so I could not help her with set up and it took her almost 3 weeks to get it set up, so she could use it. ( this was due to the fact that it was registered to me.) She was on the phone for several hours( at least 3+ hours and 3 separate calls ) with tech support before they figured this out. I understand that the registration process is intuitive for most generations BUT a simple fact sheet with a tech support phone number would have been very helpful. She had to hunt down the number, for herself. She was nervous when she didn't find anything other then the kindle, in the box. I concede that this might have prolonged the delay in getting it set up. I know she is going to LOVE this once she isn't afraid that it will be a hassle to use.

Reviews.Title: God help you if you have to call customer service...
Reviews.Author: Robert W. Segrest Jr. "Dog Lover"
Reviews.Content: So...I bought the Kindle Fire HDX 7" for my son for Christmas.  Things started off fine, but when the charge ran out, and we went to recharge the item, it would not come on again.Here comes the issue...I texted customer service (apparently not in this country) and while the person was exceedingly pleasant, it was clear from the beginning that the person did not fully grasp my questions.  Ultimately, I found out today that instead of shipping me a Kindle Fire HDX 7" (which I had told the individual was my item), I was shipped a Kindle Paperwhite.I just got off the phone with "Ted", who also was clearly not from this country, and although exceedingly pleasant proceeded to put me on hold for 15 minutes.  I confirmed that he was sending me another Kindle Fire HDX 7" before I got off the phone with him.We'll see.  I'm pretty aggravated any time I have to deal with Amazon Customer Service.  Might want to re-think this guys!

Reviews.Title: Love it.
Reviews.Author: Carolyn DeVries
Reviews.Content: My husband love this Kindle. Got it for him for Christmas. He never thought he'd like an e-reader, but now he's hooked with all that's available to him with WiFi.

Reviews.Title: PRICED JUST RIGHT
Reviews.Author: Taalib
Reviews.Content: This is a great product I'm totally satisfied with it I use it around the home, it's like having small mini laptop and it's great for watching movies and of course the Amazon system is top notch order on my products when using this tablet.

Reviews.Title: Love it!!
Reviews.Author: Kristal Allen
Reviews.Content: I bought it for my daughter who is in college and she loves it!!  She can take it to class instead of carrying her laptop and do everything she needs to on her Kindle.  This is her second Kindle product.  Glad I bought it for her!

Reviews.Title: WOW - I'm a Believer!
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: We bought 2 kindles this holiday season and we love them.  They are small and fit comfortable in your hands, easy set up, easy screens to screens, everything is at your finger tips.  I love the parent controls and the mayday button is so useful.  My son loved the mayday button, he thinks we can just call them and talk!  LOL  We are trying out the amazon prime membership- so far so good, but of course the  movies we want you have to pay for it...  I high recommend this kindle for everyone.

Reviews.Title: Christmas surprise
Reviews.Author: Travis Leonard
Reviews.Content: My wife had been wanting one since they first came out. So if course that's the only thing she wanted for Christmas. Well we both decided that we weren't going to get each other gifts this year because money is extremely tight. But when it went on sale I just had to get it, and boy I'm glad I did. She absolutely loved it, and I was the best husband ever.

Reviews.Title: Cool Toy
Reviews.Author: Mathew Carruthers
Reviews.Content: Very versatile device for all my entertainment needs when I'm on the go, but I just wish the app store had a better selection of word processing apps.  Plenty of note-taking apps, but only minimal word processing stuff.  The perks of being an Amazon Prime member are worth it - so many freebies to take advantage of...

Reviews.Title: Kindle HDX was a great gift to give.
Reviews.Author: Douglas McDermott
Reviews.Content: My step mother is over the moon with it. The Kindle HDX Has everything she wanted in a tablet. The price was on point, she loves it, can't beat that. Thank you!

Reviews.Title: Love, love, love
Reviews.Author: Catherine Darsey
Reviews.Content: I've been wanting a kindle for some time and my husband got me this one for Christmas. It does everything my cell phone does except make phone calls.

Reviews.Title: Exceeded my expectations
Reviews.Author: Gi Man Kim
Reviews.Content: First off, I've owned iPad II and currently own Nexus 7 (2nd gen).  I used my tablets for mostly playing music, reading digital books, watching videos (youtube, etc...), social media and surfing the web with little bit of business use mixed in for my work.I got the kindle fire HDX for my wife.  She recently discovered how great the Kindle books are so she's been hogging my Nexus to read.  So I figured, I'll get her the Kindle since it was on sale for X-mas.She loves her Kindle.  It's very simple and easy to use and thing is very responsive and fast!  Might be faster than my Nexus 7.  It's very user-friendly and she was off and going in no time even though she's not very techonology savvy.It is great for consumption of media (mainly Amazon media) and the Silk browser is quick and easy to use.  So if your looking for a tablet that you are going to use to play media from Amazon and to surf the web and play games.  Don't look any further.  If you are looking for a tablet that is more open and can be used for enterprising and business, look elsewhere.

Reviews.Title: Love this tablet!
Reviews.Author: Lisa Lovett
Reviews.Content: I love this little machine! It can do it all!  Love the clarity of the screen. I bought this as a gift for my husband. Now I want one for myself.

Reviews.Title: Beautiful and functional!
Reviews.Author: Thomas Textor "Sail Daddy"
Reviews.Content: This Kindle has a beautiful display and the addition of selected Apps make it comparable to many tablets as well. The size is small enough for a reader, but still large enough for personal viewing of videos and other applications as well.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 7"
Reviews.Author: blueyz132000 "Kay"
Reviews.Content: Love my new Kindle Fire...wish I could have afforded the 8.5" but I do love it and the feature.  Still learning all the tricks.

Reviews.Title: Awsome Tablet!
Reviews.Author: Mike Thorn
Reviews.Content: I never owned a tablet before but decided to give Amazon a shot with there Kindle line up after reading a lot of positive reviews and I couldn't be happier. The tablet itself is very quick, the graphics are great, the whole tablet experience with books, music, video games, apps etc.. is just well rounded and easy to use. I personally haven't bought or picked up a book to read in years and within days of owning this I decided to download a book and now I'm back in the game reading books! Can't say nothing negative about this tablet so far it just seems like Amazon put there time into building this and it shows!

Reviews.Title: Very happy customer.
Reviews.Author: Janet H
Reviews.Content: So far I've had no problems with my Kindle. I was foolish enough to buy a nook a few years back and learned from that experience to never do that again. Kindle is just what I wanted in what I would call a small tablet.

Reviews.Title: Awesome! Awesome! and Awesome!
Reviews.Author: Venus
Reviews.Content: Awesome tablet! Awesome price! Awesome High Definition! Thank you Amazon for making this awesome tablet! My son who is 13 loves this tablet! My daughter who is 9 has the kindle fire 2nd generation from last year's Christmas presents and she loved that! but she really loves her brother's HDX! Perfect for my kids! Since they both love to read, watch movies, play games and research their homework!  Plus great customer service!

Reviews.Title: kindle fire hdx
Reviews.Author: shane foley
Reviews.Content: It's great in every way. The screen is so sharp, mayday is very helpful. Can't think of anything bad about it.

Reviews.Title: Love it !
Reviews.Author: Linekin Lady
Reviews.Content: Just got the Kindle HDX and absolutely love it. Had a question about operation and within 10 seconds of clicking on the help icon, a live person pops up in a small window and answers my question in a quick and easy way. Great HD viewing, fast and so easy to use. Great vehicle also to use as a secondary device if your computer has issues and can't be used. Can easily cruise the net, check email, watch movies and of course read a book. Highly recommend!

Reviews.Title: love it and great amazon service
Reviews.Author: ShopsLot
Reviews.Content: we own a few tablets in the home...to give reference ipad air and mini retina on verizon, wifi ipad 4, note 10.1 samsung and now this kindle hdx.I do have to mention that my first hdx arrived but something was wrong with battery life both charging and usage. also one long side of screen had too much blue shadow.  I almost returned it but decided to give replacement a try with the great customer service rep on phone with amazon.  The 2nd one arrived and battery life is great. with some minimal use over the past week, still at 40%...awesome! Also the blue shadow much less on replacement kindle as well.I do love Amazon and actually love the special offers myself on my kindle but you can opt out when purchasing.  I love the speaker volume on the hdx for such a little tablet more than sufficient.  beautiful screen, browser works well and smooth.  plenty of storage with 64gb version...downloaded 3 x Harry Potter in hd but not biggest hd file from amazon library with still plenty of room left.  great for trips out and content in purse to keep entertained.  no, amazon App Store is not as vast nor as lovely as iOS but main things I use are there....Facebook, candy crush, pulse, things of this nature. I now love my free book a month from kindle lending library. I have a young child in home so love the kindle free time for her books so she can't switch to 50 shades series on accident...yes!  great for skype calls, I heart radio, fitbit tracking and mainly reading kindle books. with this kindle hdx...I will not be buying a second mini ipad retina in the home.  almost wish I got the verizon version though. happy purchase with the $50 off special.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Big H
Reviews.Content: This is my first tablet and I love it. Very easy to set up and use right out of the box. And I got a good deal on it. I would definitely recommend this to every one I know. Great item I cant say enough about it.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Marcia
Reviews.Content: My friend has one and he gave it to me for about a week. I loved it! Reading books will never be the same. It has wi fi, facebook and all that so I don't even have to turn my PC on. It would've been even better if it had more apps to choose from. Otherwise it's a great buy and the price is right!

Reviews.Title: Awesome entertainment device that's light in your hands
Reviews.Author: Ckk
Reviews.Content: Screen quality is amazing even though it flickers at time. It's so light that you can have it in your hand for hours either reading or watching videos. Simple access to Amazon ecosystem to buy more things or more kindle books.

Reviews.Title: I love my kindle but,
Reviews.Author: webbrat
Reviews.Content: I like to read for 5 or 6 hours a night sometimes longer if I can't sleep and even if I place the kindle on "airplane mode" I don't get that much time on my battery.  I really worry for when I am traveling and can't get to a place to plug it in. I also worry because my connection where one has to plug it to recharge is getting sloppy.  I really have move the cord around to get it to charge and then hope the air currents don't change it.  This happens with both the cords I own.  This is also the 2nd hdx I've had.  This one is only 3 weeks old and now it is starting up with problems.  So while I love everything about my kindle (I don't even mind the ads) I am really in a spot with what to do now. This is also the reason for four stars.

Reviews.Title: amazing
Reviews.Author: tony solino
Reviews.Content: Theirs no other tablet on the market that can top this one.  If you buy this tablet it would be the best investment.

Reviews.Title: WOW Kindle HDX is great and so is the help!
Reviews.Author: Brian
Reviews.Content: This Kindle Fire HDX is great. The performance far exceeds my expectations and the screen clarity is SUPER. The help line is great. But, the people manning the help line need a little more training. They couldn't help on a few problems, minor as they were!That was ok for now but, what if something major comes up?Other than that it is a great little tool and were having a good time using it. It's handier than a lap top.

Reviews.Title: kindle review
Reviews.Author: Jan Murray
Reviews.Content: Very happy with my new kindle. It does everything my friends iPad does but at a much lower purchase price. Still learning all the different apps available.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX is just as good as an iPAD
Reviews.Author: Tonia Randolph
Reviews.Content: This is my 3rd kindle.  There are so many great things I can say about the Kindle Fire HDX.  The upgrades just only get better and I highly recommend anyone to purchase this especially if you are a work-play type person on the go like I am.  I love all the game, business, book, and etc apps.  Amazon has very good deals on their digital apps/books.  Just make sure you get the protection plan to protect your toy and make the best of all the uses that this wonderfully created device has to offer.  I will forever be a kindle fan.  The price is within my budget.  I love it.  Keep the modern technology of the kindle fire HDX coming!

Reviews.Title: Great kindle
Reviews.Author: Barb
Reviews.Content: This is my third kindle and I love them all. However this one is awesome and the best yet. I love doing business with Amazon.

Reviews.Title: perfect gift!!!
Reviews.Author: yellowstar2000 "Candice Collins"
Reviews.Content: Love love love this!!! Couldn't be happier!! Well... it could always be better but I have yet to find anything I do not love about it!!

Reviews.Title: This was a Birthday gift for my wife.
Reviews.Author: Bob Feil
Reviews.Content: Totally surprised her with it. She is constantly looking for books to read, now she just looks them up and she is all set. Skypeing our grand kids is a special treat as well,It's like having a lap top only smaller. Great product, would suggest this to friends and family.

Reviews.Title: Great picture
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Love my Kindle Fire HDX.  I kinda wish I bought the bigger one but i still love it.  I love that I can borrow a book.

Reviews.Title: An excellent device!
Reviews.Author: Al Carpenter
Reviews.Content: Purchased this to replace an earlier model Kindle Reader for my wife and, already, she loves it!  Bigger screen and easier to use than her smart phone, yet perfect size for her purse and, of course, much more sophisticated than the black and white reader.

Reviews.Title: love it so far
Reviews.Author: L. Hayes
Reviews.Content: I only got this today. The color is amazing!I did download some puff files I cannot find on the Adobe app but their in here somewhere. I'm sure I'll figure it out.Mobile files downloaded great. My books were on I n seconds that I'll had on a kindle app. It's not too heavy not extremely light either. Nice size as I have a tablet and a nook tablet. I like the size of this a lot better and the screen.It's just so bright and vivid. I really haven't used  it for anything else yet but I bet games are amazing.I definitely recommend. I have a HD tablet and this HDX blows the color away. Usage is easy and starts up easily not a lot of work.out of the box which I always dread.  Battery seems to hold well. I've been reading for about 4  hrs and it's half drained. If your considering buying just do it you won't regret it.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 7" HDX 16GB
Reviews.Author: Lathanette Creasman
Reviews.Content: Ok I am not a techy person but like to keep up with what the new gadgets are. I never buy technical toys as I call them. Family has been trying to get me to get one of these for over a year. Well, I LOVE IT!!!! I got it because I am in a bookclub and everyone uses theirs to for their books and other avenues. I am still a paperbook fan but I love the Kindle Fire HDX. Best investment I have done since a laptop.

Reviews.Title: Bright and Light
Reviews.Author: John
Reviews.Content: The screen is truly fantastic but the first thing I noticed was how light the device was. It blows my mind how they can pack such technology in such a small package. I am very happy with this purchase and highly recommend it to anyone.

Reviews.Title: My favorite Kindle
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: I love my newest Kindle.  This is very fast, very user friendly. I recently lost my laptop, but since I have been using this tablet, I won't replace the laptop.  I have a desktop computer when I want a keyboard, or a big screen for movies.  But, this tablet is fantastic for everything else, all the time, any time.  I check email, watch movies, read books, listen to music. LOVE IT!  I took it to school and let my 5th graders take turns using it for independent reading time.  It made reading so much fun for them. I also used a timer app in class as well.  The battery life is good on this tablet.  I use my other kindles, but this is my favorite one.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Oceansky
Reviews.Content: So far I am loving my Kidle Fire HDX.  It is fast on its downloads and I'm still playing with it to get to know all it's features.

Reviews.Title: Disappointing after owning an iPad
Reviews.Author: Steve Stockdale
Reviews.Content: I bought two of these for Christmas, one for me one and one as a gift, at $179. As much as I wanted to like it and use it, it's just not as convenient as the iPad. For one, getting music to it (except music purchased through Amazon) is a pain, requiring a file transfer app to copy from my iTunes library. From a usability standpoint, there are annoying compromises like: 1) I have to get my glasses and turn on a bright light to make sure I'm plugging the charger adapter in correctly, and then when I do, the connector is at an odd angle - not parallet to the unit, which makes it seem like it's less secure and more fragile; 2) the switch from portrait to landscape is sluggish; 3) having the power and volume controls on the underside are really inconvenient if you want to use it as a music play. The picture is great, but the Amazon-specific OS is a baffling decision by Amazon and indicates their priority is not user experience but on their ability to control the user's experience. The lack of apps and the quality of the apps is disappointing - still haven't been able to get the DirecTV remote app and the Chromecast app to work on the Kindle Fire HDX, whereas I have no problem with the apps on my iPad 2. The Kindle Fire is a perfect example of where comparing hardware for portable devices makes little sense unless you consider the entire functional experience with apps, controls, displays, menus, etc. In this respect Kindle falls short, IMO.

Reviews.Title: Older Versions are BETTER
Reviews.Author: Shelly
Reviews.Content: I like the new Kindle BUT the OLDER versions are much better. You can no longer use a HDMI device to stream to your TV. You now must purchase an additional product from amazon at a cost of around $100.  I had hoped to use the device in my classroom and didn't even think to look if they changed this capability. If I had known I wouldn't have purchased this product.

Reviews.Title: Completely Self-Indulgent Purchase - Absolutely Delightful
Reviews.Author: Byzantine Dixie
Reviews.Content: I have been straddling the Apple / Android fence for a while now, with one foot in both camps.  But the time came to declare allegiance.  Music and video purchases are less and less dependent on hard media like CDs and DVDs and are becoming more and more cloud based.  Which cloud…that was the decision to make.So Amazon came out with fireTV…and I took the plunge and decide to go with Amazon for my video purchases.  I have been a prime member since its inception…and it is the first place I go to when I am looking to buy something.  I love Amazon…probably in an unwholesome way.With that decision behind me I was now free to find a device to take entertainment with me when I travel for work.  Do you have any idea how long and painful it can be to copy DVDs into digital files to take along when traveling…I simply did not have the patience to convert all 14 seasons Dallas!  I needed a device that would hold a number of videos to get me through at least 2 weeks overseas at a time.  Reliable streaming overseas is generally not an option for a variety of reasons.And so I bought a Kindle FireHDX (64MB, no ads) and have been absolutely delighted…I seriously couldn’t be happier.  It is so FAST…compared to my android ASUS transformer tablet.  The video quality is beautiful.  The sound is great and it is extremely simple to download videos…even Prime videos…to take along on my travels.Of course, nothing is perfect.  There are some disappointments but they are relatively minor.1) Battery life is disappointing if wifi is not disabled.  That has been my experience.  I will lose 15 – 20% overnight if I leave the wifi on.  With the wifi off…battery life is very good.  If there is an option to turn off wifi after being asleep for a while…I don’t know about it yet.  Long term, hopefully something like this will be developed in a software update.2) Lack of a mini HDMI out.  I like to plug my device into the HDMI ports of hotel TVs and watch my shows from the bigger screen.  When I realized too late that it had no HDMI out, I bought a Tronsmart miracast device.  It will work but not as smoothly or easily as a simple cable would.  I think the miracast is not quite ready for prime time yet.  It is not the end of the world if I can’t hook up the hotel TV.  Watching directly from the Kindle works well.3) Apps…need more.  I once had a Blackberry Playbook.  What awesome tablet that was…really.  Fine quality device, perfect in every way…except for the limited number of apps.  Amazon has to make this a priority.  And the apps need to work beautifully…like they do on my iPhone (see, I said I had one foot in both camps!)4) Flicker.  I notice a disturbing flicker with one of my apps.  Haven’t let determined if this is strictly a single app issue or if it will show up elsewhere.  I’ll update later if it is more than just this one app.All in all I feel this was a most self-indulgent purchase…it is such a sweet device and the perfect travel companion.  (Don’t tell my husband!)

Reviews.Title: kindle fire 7 Quit working
Reviews.Author: Roy Cooper
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my wife and have had it maybe month and everything stopped working can not even unlock screen when you reset it.

Reviews.Title: Easy To Use
Reviews.Author: Big Momma
Reviews.Content: Loved it! It took a minute but I caught on to it. Smooth operation of software and other functions. The input buttons are on an angle and it's a bit different plugging cords in. I'm used to a home or wake up button. I don't like to take my kindle fire HDX 7 outside the protective case just to get it going again. I wonder if the power button is gonna eventually wear out.

Reviews.Title: Happier Than a Child at Christmas!
Reviews.Author: Moosie
Reviews.Content: Oh My God!  I LOVE this Kindle.  This replaced my old Kindle Keyboard.  I didn't realize I was living in the dinosaur age with that until I bought this new one.  I wanted to treat myself to an early birthday present.  Amazon really pulled out all the stops with this one!  I'm so proud of this Kindle.It does just about everything a computer can do.  The colors, graphics are awesome!  Games on this Kindle HDX device are so vivid, clear and work flawlessly.  I love having access to my music, the downloads are faster and easier.  I downloaded a classical music radio app, and I am so pleased with this app.  I also love reading my books on it, the screen is easier to see, looks better.I am so happy with this purchase.  This thing is so precious to me.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Khnet
Reviews.Content: Fantastic tablet, great for kids too. I love the kindle free time features and limits you can set. Easy access and fun to play with

Reviews.Title: It's good but not great
Reviews.Author: bluewolf37
Reviews.Content: I have owned several different tablets and didn't wow me like i was hoping it was going to.Pros* The speakers are wonderful compared to all of my old tablets and some old laptops.* The touchscreen is the most responsive touchsreen that i have ever used. (i didn't realize my old tablet had lag until i used this)* it's fast all around from loading apps to starting a movie* The screen is beautiful when watching movies.* it feels very solid in the hands like it is built well.* If you have amazon prime you have access to the kindle lending library and amazon prime videos (this was the reason i decided on kindle this time)*the app store has comixology* It has a feature called Quiet time so you don't get notifications wanking you up when you are asleep* Wireless reception is very strong and stable.* Amazon music store is normally cheaper and better than itunes and the play store. (I love the fact that i don't have to download my music to every device i own to listen to it)* it is a good price.* Some movies and books have a wonderful feature called X-Ray that gives you useful information. In movies it can tell you the actors and actresses on screen and what song is playing. If you click in the names out connects to imdb for more info.Cons*you cannot connect to the play store and the amazon app store is extremely lacking and/or outdated. You can sideload some apps but any that connect to google services wont work 100%. For example I sideloaded chrome and even though I can use it to browse i cant sign in to sync bookmarks with my computer and phone. I also got the youtube app and it worked but once again you cant sign in to see all your subscriptions. Gmail is compleatly useless...Etc...*There is a blue haze around the edges of the screen that is almost painful when reading. I ended up changing kindle reading settings to a night mode so it didn't bother me.*apps that had no problems on other tablets or phones seem less stable on the kindle. I bought a game on the amazon app store and it ended up blue screening the device which was surprising since i never had a tablet give me the blue screen of death before (but to be fair it hasn't had a problem since then )* battery life when watching videos is worse than my asus tablet* you don't see the date when you pull down the notification barLast thoughts*It is probably a good idea to add a password to the kindle because it is always signed into amazon. This includes their kindle books store, app store, music store, and physical product store. So if you have kids or fear it may get stolen a password is a good idea. I would also look into the parental controls.

Reviews.Title: Unreliable and Unimpressive
Reviews.Author: JVR Mom
Reviews.Content: This was the 4th Kindle Fire we recieved.  #1 wouldnt connect to WiFi #2 Battery dead less than 90 mins #3 dead battery AND WIFI issues... i continues to give them a try becuase the Kindle Free time seemed like a good value for my 3 yr old.Unimpressed by Kindle Free time content.  Id prefer to spend a few bucks each month and own the content of my choice.  We will purchase another MS Surface Table and a kid friendly case.

Reviews.Title: What a heartbreak! You Can't Use GOOGLE!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I bought my very first tablet, the Kindle Fire. I was so excited when it arrived. I put on the screen protector, put it in it's case, set it up with my acct information. I was in awe of the look and feel of it. It is beautiful! The picture and sound are amazing too. If you love Amazon, this is probably exactly what you want!I went into the situation blind. I read a lot of kindle books so I thought the Fire would be great. I didn't understand that a tablet would block you from using specific programs they deem competition. I use Google Music, I pay for unlimited music each month. It never occurred to me that I wouldn't be able to stream my music over my tablet! It doesn't make any sense to me! My HTC phone, which uses google, lets me download Amazon apps so why wouldn't Amazon let me use Google?!I went into chat with an Amazon rep to find out if there was anything I could do to get my music on it. They said no, they were sorry. They said I was free to buy music from them tho. Of course I am but I don't want to buy every stupid song that pops into my head. I'd go broke!And they don't offer anything like unlimited streaming that I could switch to.In looking through the kindle apps, I also learned that the Google apps that are offered (maps, gmail) had horrible ratings with comments that they don't work at all.I am a HUGE Amazon fan. And even through this, I am a loyal customer. But I am  so deeply disappointed. I am disappointed that they have chosen an isolationist approach to their product. Having my music available to me would not have taken any dollars away from them. I still would have bought my books and movies through them. Probably a lot more than I do now. I don't buy my music thru Amazon, I buy it thru iTunes. I always have and I always will. I keep my music on Google Music. I use the unlimited music to hear new songs so I know if I want to buy it or not. By not letting me stream music they've lost book and movie purchases. They never would have had much music business from me. Maybe some, bec I might be too lazy to use iTunes. The thing is, I have my way of doing things. I use many products. I don't want to feel contained or limited or be forced into changing for literally a BAD BUSINESS decision by Amazon.I wanted the kindle bec I thought it might be nice to use in the kitchen or around the house specifically for entertainment purposes. Reading, music, movies, tv shows. A sort of all purpose entertainment center. Like they advertise. What they don't say on their product page is that you won't be able to use Google services. It should be very specific for people like me who are new to the tablet world. I bought a case and protective covers and the warranty.  Amazon is charging me money for the returns and some of it can't be returned. I feel like they withheld important information and now I am paying the price for it.I did some research last night and decided to go with the second generation Nexus. It will stream music, allow Amazon apps and it has a cute keyboard.  They don't force me into using them exclusively!Amazon is really on the wrong side of this!!
